String.Source: So I am. I guess we could use my blood. Do you have any arrows? Elven arrows. I'm not going to just bleed on any old thing.
String.Dest: Begitulah aku. Kurasa kita bisa memakai darahku. Apa kamu punya anak panah? Anak panah elf. Aku tidak akan begitu saja mengeluarkan darahku pada apa pun yang sembarangan.

String.Source: The castle, of course, is yours. We shall follow you, and help spread your influence across Skyrim.
String.Dest: Kastil itu, tentu saja, milik Anda. Kami akan mengikutinya, dan membantu menyebarkan pengaruh Anda ke seluruh Skyrim.

String.Source: Once saw Harkon rip a man in half. He's powerful like you wouldn't believe.
String.Dest: Pernah melihat Harkon merobek seorang pria menjadi dua. Dia begitu kuat seperti yang tak bisa kau percayai.

String.Source: Run, coward! You're a traitor to your race!
String.Dest: Lari, pengecut! Kau pengkhianat rasmu!

String.Source: So, the deed has been done.
String.Dest: Jadi, perbuatan itu sudah selesai.

String.Source: Be a dear and fetch me another set of Dwemer diagrams?
String.Dest: Bisa tolong ambilkan saya satu set diagram Dwemer lagi?

String.Source: In the meantime, if there are any potions you might need, feel free to help yourself.
String.Dest: Sementara itu, jika ada potions yang Anda butuhkan, silakan ambil sendiri.

String.Source: Anyway, this is all very touching, but don't we have some more important things to worry about right now?
String.Dest: Bagaimanapun, semua ini memang mengharukan, tapi bukankah kita punya halâ€‘hal yang lebih penting untuk dikhawatirkan saat ini?

String.Source: Be a dear and collect these diagrams for me?
String.Dest: Bisa tolong kumpulkan diagram-diagram ini untukku?

String.Source: Think I'll be sad when we're done collecting these. Who knows though, maybe more plans will turn up in the future.
String.Dest: Kupikir aku akan sedih ketika kita selesai mengumpulkan ini. Siapa tahu, mungkin lebih banyak rencana akan muncul di masa depan.

String.Source: Makes everything else worth it.
String.Dest: Membuat segala yang lain menjadi berharga.

String.Source: I'm starting to think you like this as much as I do!
String.Dest: Aku mulai berpikir kau menyukainya sama seperti aku!

String.Source: What? What are you talking about?
String.Dest: Apa? Apa yang kau bicarakan?

String.Source: I think both of our parents have failed us. Just you and me against the world, now.
String.Dest: Aku rasa kedua orang tua kami telah mengecewakan kami. Hanya kamu dan aku melawan dunia, sekarang.

String.Source: But as luck would have it, I've tracked down the location of some actual Dwemer diagram drawings!
String.Dest: Namun nasib berpihak padaku, aku telah melacak lokasi beberapa gambar diagram Dwemer yang sebenarnya!

String.Source: I think even Gunmar's been impressed with what we've managed to do with the Dwemer drawings. Let's see what we can do with these ones!
String.Dest: Saya rasa bahkan Gunmar terkesan dengan apa yang telah kami capai dengan gambar-gambar Dwemer itu. Mari lihat apa yang bisa kami lakukan dengan yang ini!

String.Source: We've been so terribly fortunate. I can't wait to see what's in these drawings.
String.Dest: Kami sangat beruntung. Saya tidak sabar untuk melihat apa yang ada di dalam gambar-gambar ini.

String.Source: I just didn't know when.
String.Dest: Saya hanya tidak tahu kapan.

String.Source: Like that they were supposed to guard some vampire here, but wound up all becoming vampires themselves when they saw how powerful he was.
String.Dest: Seperti itu, mereka seharusnya menjaga seorang vampir di sini, tapi malah semua menjadi vampir sendiri ketika mereka menyadari betapa kuatnya dia.

String.Source: These people seem nervous, which makes me nervous.
String.Dest: Orangâ€‘orang ini tampak gugup, yang membuatku gugup.

String.Source: I'd read stories about the Solitude windmill, but I didn't expect it to be that big!
String.Dest: Aku pernah membaca cerita tentang Solitude Windmill, tapi aku tidak menyangka itu begitu besar!

String.Source: I don't know that name. You say she's Jarl of Solitude? Who supports her?
String.Dest: Aku tidak tahu nama itu. Kau bilang dia Jarl Solitude? Siapa yang mendukungnya?

String.Source: Don't say I didn't warn you.
String.Dest: Jangan bilang aku tidak memperingatkanmu.

String.Source: It's your choice whether to attempt to deal with them or force your way through.
String.Dest: Pilihan ada pada Anda, apakah akan mencoba mengatasi mereka atau memaksa jalan melewatinya.

String.Source: Keep in mind that Redwater Den has fallen into... well, let's just say less reputable members of society now dwell there.
String.Dest: Ingatlah bahwa Redwater Den telah jatuh ke... yah, mari kita katakan bahwa anggota masyarakat yang kurang terhormat kini tinggal di sana.

String.Source: Welcome back.
String.Dest: Selamat kembali.

String.Source: I must have been gone longer than I thought. Definitely longer than we planned.
String.Dest: Aku pasti sudah pergi lebih lama dari yang kupikir. Jelas lebih lama daripada yang kami rencanakan.

String.Source: I'll see you soon.
String.Dest: Sampai jumpa lagi segera.

String.Source: That was a long time ago, but the idea was, and is, a good one. That's why I'm bringing it back.
String.Dest: Itu sudah lama berlalu, namun idenya dulu, dan masih, merupakan ide yang bagus. Itulah mengapa saya mengembalikannya.

String.Source: And so I'm going to give you a chance to get yourself cured.
String.Dest: Jadi aku akan memberimu kesempatan untuk menyembuhkan dirimu sendiri.

String.Source: You think they turned him?
String.Dest: Kau pikir mereka memalingkannya?

String.Source: Well, growing up the way I did, you get used to it.
String.Dest: Yah, tumbuh seperti yang aku alami, kamu jadi terbiasa.

String.Source: Good luck.
String.Dest: Semoga berhasil.

String.Source: All clean. I feel like I can breathe again for the first time since I was turned.
String.Dest: Semua bersih. Saya merasa seolah-olah saya bisa bernapas lagi untuk pertama kalinya sejak saya menjadi vampir.

String.Source: We'll talk more when we're there.
String.Dest: Kita akan berbicara lebih banyak ketika kita sampai di sana.

String.Source: Here I am. Human as ever.
String.Dest: Aku di sini. Manusia seperti biasa.

String.Source: It is time for action.
String.Dest: Sudah waktunya bertindak.

String.Source: I guess it doesn't matter now. At least Isran is trying to do something noble with the name.
String.Dest: Kurasa itu tidak penting lagi. Setidaknya Isran sedang berusaha melakukan sesuatu yang mulia dengan nama itu.

String.Source: Arkay be with you, my friend.
String.Dest: Semoga Arkay bersamamu, temanku.

String.Source: Well met, friend.
String.Dest: Selamat bertemu, kawan.

String.Source: Is something wrong?
String.Dest: Ada yang salah?

String.Source: By now, my daughter will have told you what we are.
String.Dest: Saat ini, putriku sudah memberitahumu apa kami.

String.Source: I'm not sure.
String.Dest: Saya tidak yakin.

String.Source: My Lady.
String.Dest: Nyonya.

String.Source: Leaving the wayshrines unguarded would be violating my sacred duty as a Knight-Paladin of Auriel.
String.Dest: Meninggalkan Wayshrines tanpa pengawal akan melanggar tugas suci saya sebagai Kesatria-Paladin Auriel.

String.Source: Let someone else rule. I just want to kill and feed.
String.Dest: Biarkan orang lain memerintah. Aku hanya ingin membunuh dan makan.

String.Source: It is an honor to serve Harkon, is it not?
String.Dest: Merupakan kehormatan untuk melayani Harkon, bukankah begitu?

String.Source: The Dawnguard will now be dedicated to safeguarding it, making sure that prophecy will never come to pass.
String.Dest: Dawnguard kini akan didedikasikan untuk melindungi hal itu, memastikan bahwa ramalan itu tidak akan pernah terwujud.

String.Source: I wonder what these souls do all day. They look... bored.
String.Dest: Aku bertanya-tanya apa yang dilakukan Souls ini sepanjang hari. Mereka terlihat... bosan.

String.Source: Wait, is he talking about me?
String.Dest: Tunggu, apa dia sedang berbicara tentangku?

String.Source: May Auri-El keep you free from harm.
String.Dest: Semoga Auri-El melindungi Anda dari bahaya.

String.Source: These Falmer are... they're frozen in the ice.
String.Dest: Falmer ini... mereka beku dalam es.

String.Source: I wonder how long they've been like this.
String.Dest: Aku bertanya-tanya sudah berapa lama mereka begini.

String.Source: I don't think you can ever be ready to kill your parent.
String.Dest: Saya tidak berpikir kamu pernah siap untuk membunuh orang tuamu.

String.Source: There's probably groves like this all over Tamriel. Most people just don't even know what to look for.
String.Dest: Mungkin ada hutan kecil seperti ini di seluruh Tamriel. Kebanyakan orang bahkan tidak tahu apa yang harus dicari.

String.Source: The prophecy said that vampires would no longer need to fear the sun. For someone who fancied himself as vampire royalty, that's pretty seductive.
String.Dest: Nubuat mengatakan bahwa vampir tidak lagi perlu takut pada matahari. Bagi seseorang yang menganggap dirinya bangsawan vampir, itu cukup menggoda.

String.Source: Another victory for the Dawnguard.
String.Dest: Satu kemenangan lagi untuk Dawnguard.

String.Source: We've got enough to worry about right now. You stay focused, and I'll worry about me.
String.Dest: Kita sudah punya cukup hal untuk dikhawatirkan saat ini. Tetap fokus, dan aku akan mengurus diriku.

String.Source: Only what I've heard.
String.Dest: Hanya apa yang kudengar.

String.Source: Now, acknowledge me as your master!
String.Dest: Sekarang, akui aku sebagai tuanmu!

String.Source: Thank you for breaking that foul vampire's hold over me.
String.Dest: Terima kasih telah mematahkan cengkeraman vampire busuk itu atas diriku.

String.Source: (Whine)
String.Dest: (Rintih)

String.Source: Find all of them! Don't let any of them get away!
String.Dest: Temukan semua mereka! Jangan biarkan satu pun melarikan diri!

String.Source: Are you alright? Come on, we can do this. I know we can.
String.Dest: Apakah kamu baik-baik saja? Ayo, kita bisa melakukannya. Aku tahu kita bisa.

String.Source: Figured.
String.Dest: Aku sudah mengira begitu.

String.Source: That makes sense.
String.Dest: Itu masuk akal.

String.Source: Best of luck to you.
String.Dest: Semoga berhasil.

String.Source: Yes, they smell like trolls. But do you have to? Consider washing up a bit more often.
String.Dest: Ya, mereka berbau seperti troll. Tapi apakah kau harus? Pertimbangkan untuk mandi lebih sering.

String.Source: I despise your presence, mortal!
String.Dest: Aku membenci kehadiranmu, makhluk fana!

String.Source: Well, I'll be out of your hair soon enough.
String.Dest: Nah, aku akan segera tidak mengganggu kamu lagi.

String.Source: (Bark)
String.Dest: (Gonggong)

String.Source: Talk to Gunmar if you need materials.
String.Dest: Bicaralah dengan Gunmar jika kamu membutuhkan bahan.

String.Source: Sorine and Gunmar are settling in.
String.Dest: Sorine dan Gunmar sedang menetap.

String.Source: No... why?
String.Dest: Tidak... kenapa?

String.Source: But my master is dead, and his enemies will pay!
String.Dest: Tapi tuanku sudah mati, dan musuhâ€‘musuhnya akan membayar!

String.Source: Stop apologizing for everything.
String.Dest: Berhentilah meminta maaf atas segala hal.

String.Source: Leave no vampire in one piece!
String.Dest: Jangan biarkan satu vampir pun selamat!

String.Source: If you need some help, I'm ready.
String.Dest: Jika kamu butuh bantuan, aku siap.

String.Source: I'll probably stay with the Dawnguard, for as long as they'll let me.
String.Dest: Aku mungkin akan tetap bersama Dawnguard, selama mereka mengizinkannya.

String.Source: We didn't all get to have parents like yours. Sometimes this is just... how it is.
String.Dest: Kita semua tidak memiliki orang tua seperti milikmu. Kadang-kadang memang begitu... begitu adanya.

String.Source: Of course it matters to you, but you don't get to make this decision for me.
String.Dest: Tentu saja itu penting bagimu, tetapi kau tidak berhak membuat keputusan ini untukku.

String.Source: But I'm afraid that they're well beyond a cure at this point.
String.Dest: Tapi saya khawatir bahwa mereka sudah berada di luar jangkauan penyembuhan pada titik ini.

String.Source: Oh. I... I see.
String.Dest: Oh. Aku... Aku mengerti.

String.Source: Let's just get this over with. Do you have any elven arrows?
String.Dest: Mari kita selesaikan saja ini. Apakah kamu punya panah elf?

String.Source: Forget it.
String.Dest: Lupakan saja.

String.Source: I'm going to go away for a while. I'll meet you back home when I'm done.
String.Dest: Aku akan pergi dulu sebentar. Aku akan menemuimu kembali di rumah ketika selesai.

String.Source: I'll speak to Falion. I've heard he knows about these things.
String.Dest: Saya akan berbicara dengan Falion. Saya dengar dia tahu tentang hal-hal ini.

String.Source: Does it bother you that I'm here?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu terganggu karena aku di sini?

String.Source: I understand.
String.Dest: Saya mengerti.

String.Source: (Growl)
String.Dest: (Geram)

String.Source: Enough games, let's finish this!
String.Dest: Cukup Games, mari selesaikan ini!

String.Source: Which friends would those be?
String.Dest: Temanâ€‘teman yang mana itu?

String.Source: If Isran is really asking for me, it must be serious. I'll help. Where do you need me to go?
String.Dest: Jika Isran benarâ€‘benar memanggilku, pasti ada hal yang serius. Aku akan membantu. Ke mana kau butuhku pergi?

String.Source: You've already seen my father's obsession. My mother's not a whole lot better, but you'll see that soon enough.
String.Dest: Kau sudah melihat obsesi ayahku. Ibuku tidak jauh lebih baik, tapi kau akan melihatnya segera.

String.Source: You've met both of my parents. They're both crazy in their own way.
String.Dest: Kamu sudah bertemu kedua orang tuaku. Mereka berdua gila dengan cara mereka masing-masing.

String.Source: We both know what's going to have to happen once we find the bow.
String.Dest: Kita berdua tahu apa yang harus terjadi begitu kita menemukan busur itu.

String.Source: It's not that simple. I guess it never is with families, is it?
String.Dest: Tidak sesederhana itu. Kupikir memang tidak pernah begitu dengan keluarga, kan?

String.Source: That letter's the last I've heard of her and mentions where she is. Now please, leave me alone.
String.Dest: Surat itu adalah kabar terakhir yang kutahu tentangnya dan menyebutkan di mana dia berada. Sekarang, tolong, biarkan aku saja.

String.Source: You're a good son.
String.Dest: Kau anak yang baik.

String.Source: Congratulations, friend. You've won a well-deserved victory here.
String.Dest: Selamat, temanku. Kau telah meraih kemenangan yang layak di sini.

String.Source: Your blood will be mine!
String.Dest: Darahmu akan jadi milikku!

String.Source: Let's... uh... let's just keep going.
String.Dest: Ayo... uh... mari kita teruskan saja.

String.Source: No, it's probably not.
String.Dest: Tidak, sepertinya tidak.

String.Source: Empire? What... what empire?
String.Dest: Imperium? Apa... apa imperium?

String.Source: Only I hear that's not quite how it happened. Secret organization, you see. No one to blame when homes are broken into, things stolen.
String.Dest: Hanya aku yang mendengar itu tidak persis seperti yang terjadi. Organisasi rahasia, kau lihat. Tidak ada yang dapat disalahkan ketika rumah-rumah dibobol dan barang-barang dicuri.

String.Source: Arvak, please! You can stop running now!
String.Dest: Arvak, tolong! Kamu bisa berhenti berlari sekarang!

String.Source: It would be nice not to always be so thirsty.
String.Dest: Akan menyenangkan kalau tidak selalu begitu haus.

String.Source: It sounds like... that's the last bit of the prophecy. The blood of a Daughter of Coldharbour can corrupt the bow.
String.Dest: Sepertinya... itu bagian terakhir dari ramalan. Darah seorang Putri Coldharbour dapat merusak busur.

String.Source: Hold it! She's the one Tolan mentioned.
String.Dest: Tahan dulu! Dia orang yang Tolan sebutkan.

String.Source: It ends here!
String.Dest: Berakhir di sini!

String.Source: It's the only way they'll discover that they weren't always malignant... they were once a proud and prosperous race.
String.Dest: Itu satu-satunya cara agar mereka menyadari bahwa mereka tidak selalu jahat... dulu mereka adalah ras yang bangga dan makmur.

String.Source: Well, maybe it really is time to resurrect the Dawnguard.
String.Dest: Yah, mungkin memang saatnya menghidupkan kembali Dawnguard.

String.Source: You must help me find my Arvak. He doesn't deserve to be in a place like this!
String.Dest: Kamu harus membantu aku menemukan Arvak-ku. Dia tidak pantas berada di tempat seperti ini!

String.Source: I mean, what do you think my father will do when we bring him the bow?
String.Dest: Maksudku, apa yang kau kira ayahku akan lakukan saat kami membawakan dia busur itu?

String.Source: But at that point, he'll have everything he's ever wanted.
String.Dest: Namun pada titik itu, dia akan memiliki segala yang pernah dia inginkan.

String.Source: And I thought my father was the delusional one.
String.Dest: Dan aku pikir ayahku orang yang delusional.

String.Source: He just became absorbed... obsessed. It was kind of sick, actually.
String.Dest: Dia baru saja menjadi terfokus... terobsesi. Sebenarnya, itu agak gila.

String.Source: Oh, gods...
String.Dest: Oh, dewa-dewa...

String.Source: Come on, let's take it to Dexion.
String.Dest: Ayo, kita bawa ke Dexion.

String.Source: And I'll be unnecessary once he has it.
String.Dest: Dan aku akan menjadi tidak diperlukan begitu dia memilikinya.

String.Source: Let's just get this over with.
String.Dest: Mari kita selesaikan saja ini.

String.Source: My father... no, not really. I did spend a lot of time with my mother, but she saw me more like a protege than a daughter.
String.Dest: Ayahku... tidak, tidak begitu. Aku memang menghabiskan banyak waktu bersama ibuku, namun dia melihatku lebih sebagai murid daripada sebagai anak perempuan.

String.Source: I think you know.
String.Dest: Saya rasa kamu tahu.

String.Source: I will darken the skies!
String.Dest: Aku akan menggelapkan langit!

String.Source: I see. That would explain much.
String.Dest: Saya mengerti. Itu akan menjelaskan banyak hal.

String.Source: If? I've been assuming that's where all this is going.
String.Dest: Jika? Aku sudah mengira inilah tujuan semua ini.

String.Source: Arkay tells me the Sun Fire spell can break open those caches, but I've never found one. I think he might be lying to me.
String.Dest: Arkay memberitahuku bahwa mantra Sun Fire dapat membuka petiâ€‘peti itu, tapi aku belum pernah menemukan satu. Aku rasa dia mungkin berbohong padaku.

String.Source: This latest attack proves it's the right time.
String.Dest: Serangan terbaru ini membuktikan bahwa ini saat yang tepat.

String.Source: I don't like him any more than you do. But he is my father.
String.Dest: Aku tidak menyukainya lebih dari kamu. Tapi dia ayahku.

String.Source: Yes, I can feel your defenses crumbling. You want it to end. You want to give in to me.
String.Dest: Ya, aku bisa merasakan pertahananmu hancur. Kau ingin ini berakhir. Kau ingin menyerah padaku.

String.Source: I want to add some punch to our crossbow capabilities, I've done all I can on my own. I need a little inspiration.
String.Dest: Saya ingin menambah kekuatan pada kemampuan busur silang kami, saya sudah melakukan segala yang saya bisa sendiri. Saya membutuhkan sedikit inspirasi.

String.Source: I hope so.
String.Dest: Saya harap begitu.

String.Source: I know you didn't know your parents. But if they were anything like mine, you're better off.
String.Dest: Aku tahu kamu tidak mengenal orang tuamu. Tapi kalau mereka seperti orang tuaku, kamu akan berada dalam keadaan yang lebih baik.

String.Source: That's too bad.
String.Dest: Sayang sekali.

String.Source: Please, he's such a loyal creature, and he's been running for so long. You have to save him! A place like this will change you...
String.Dest: Tolong, dia begitu makhluk yang setia, dan dia telah berlari begitu lama. Kamu harus menyelamatkannya! Tempat seperti ini akan mengubahmu...

String.Source: Your mind was strong, but you're exhausted from the struggle.
String.Dest: Pikiranmu kuat, tapi kau kelelahan setelah perjuangan itu.

String.Source: I'm working on it, now give me some silence so I can think.
String.Dest: Aku sedang mengerjakannya, sekarang beri aku sedikit keheningan agar aku bisa berpikir.

String.Source: But I can't wait to see these drawings. Go on, get out of here!
String.Dest: Tapi aku tidak sabar melihat gambar-gambar ini. Ayo, pergilah dari sini!

String.Source: Vyrthur and myself are the only two snow elves that remain.
String.Dest: Vyrthur dan saya adalah satu-satunya dua elf salju yang masih ada.

String.Source: Yesâ€¦ masterâ€¦
String.Dest: Yaâ€¦ masterâ€¦

String.Source: The people of Skyrim owe you a great deal, whether they know it or not.
String.Dest: Orang-orang Skyrim berutang banyak kepadamu, baik mereka menyadarinya atau tidak.

String.Source: What can I do for you?
String.Dest: Apa yang bisa saya bantu?

String.Source: Oh, wonderful. A war of succession. Good to know the world didn't get boring while I was gone.
String.Dest: Oh, luar biasa. Perang suksesi. Senang mengetahui dunia tidak menjadi membosankan saat aku pergi.

String.Source: Not as much.
String.Dest: Tidak sebanyak itu.

String.Source: Sorine needs help with her project to improve our crossbows. And if that doesn't interest you...
String.Dest: Sorine membutuhkan bantuan dengan proyeknya untuk meningkatkan busur silang kami. Dan jika itu tidak menarik bagimu...

String.Source: (Whine)
String.Dest: (Rintih)

String.Source: The Soul Cairn will offer a unique opportunity to continue my studies, and I intend to complete my research.
String.Dest: Soul Cairn akan menawarkan kesempatan unik untuk melanjutkan studi saya, dan saya berniat menyelesaikan penelitian saya.

String.Source: Of course, if you've got any more adventures planned...
String.Dest: Tentu saja, kalau kamu punya petualangan lain yang direncanakan...

String.Source: Fought vampires wherever they found them. I aim to continue that mission.
String.Dest: Berperang melawan vampir di mana pun mereka berada. Aku bertekad melanjutkan misi itu.

String.Source: They were eventually forced to put him down. The Jarl banished them from the hold, but they stuck to their cause.
String.Dest: Mereka akhirnya dipaksa menghabiskannya. Sang Jarl mengusir mereka dari wilayah itu, tetapi mereka tetap berpegang pada tujuan mereka.

String.Source: And take this as well. Seeing as Saint Jiub has ascended to pure spiritual form, I won't need it any longer.
String.Dest: Ambil ini juga. Karena Saint Jiub telah naik ke bentuk spiritual murni, aku tidak lagi membutuhkannya.

String.Source: That... that wasn't me you were fighting.
String.Dest: Itu... itu bukan aku yang kau lawan.

String.Source: Oh, wow. All right, well, what do you think my father's going to do once we bring the bow to him?
String.Dest: Oh, wow. Baiklah, jadi, apa yang kamu pikir ayahku akan lakukan setelah kita menyerahkan busur itu kepadanya?

String.Source: If you were anybody else, I'd probably be taking some blood from you for asking that.
String.Dest: Kalau kamu orang lain, aku pasti bakal ngambil darahmu cuma karena menanyakan itu.

String.Source: Hiding won't help you!
String.Dest: Bersembunyi tidak akan membantu kamu!

String.Source: You... always say what you think, don't you?
String.Dest: Kau... selalu mengatakannya apa yang kau pikirkan, kan?

String.Source: You'd better get out of here and get yourself cured.
String.Dest: Sebaiknya kamu keluar dari sini dan menyembuhkan dirimu.

String.Source: Arvak?
String.Dest: Arvak?

String.Source: It was the Betrayed... they did something to him, I just don't know why Auri-El would allow this to happen.
String.Dest: Itu adalah The Betrayed... mereka melakukan sesuatu padanya, saya tidak tahu mengapa Auriâ€‘El membiarkan hal ini terjadi.

String.Source: Their job was to keep the Jarl's son contained within. They took it seriously, and served honorably.
String.Dest: Tugas mereka adalah menjaga agar putra Jarl tetap terkunci di dalam. Mereka menganggapnya serius, dan melayani dengan hormat.

String.Source: So, let's get this straight.
String.Dest: Jadi, mari kita luruskan dulu.

String.Source: Once we're inside, just keep quiet for a bit. Let me take the lead.
String.Dest: Setelah kita masuk, diamlah sebentar. Biarkan aku memimpin.

String.Source: I don't want to either, but you're going to have to jump. I'll be... right behind you. Above you. Just go.
String.Dest: Aku juga tidak mau, tapi kamu harus melompat. Aku akan... tepat di belakangmu. Di atasmu. Pergi saja.

String.Source: I'll rend the flesh from your bones!
String.Dest: Aku akan mengoyak daging dari tulangmu!

String.Source: I did. But something about you makes me think I can trust you. I hope I'm not wrong.
String.Dest: Aku melakukannya. Tapi ada sesuatu tentangmu yang membuatku merasa bisa mempercayaimu. Aku harap aku tidak salah.

String.Source: Keep your eyes open, here.
String.Dest: Simpan Eyes Open Anda, di sini.

String.Source: Because that means there's still hope that they might one day shed their hatred and learn to believe in Auri-El once again.
String.Dest: Karena itu berarti masih ada harapan bahwa mereka suatu hari nanti dapat melepaskan kebencian mereka dan belajar mempercayai Auri-El sekali lagi.

String.Source: A vampire?
String.Dest: Seorang vampir?

String.Source: Which just makes you a more dangerous rival.
String.Dest: Yang justru membuatmu menjadi rival yang lebih berbahaya.

String.Source: Look at this. I should've known it was only a matter of time before they found us.
String.Dest: Lihat ini. Seharusnya saya tahu bahwa ini hanya soal waktu sebelum mereka menemukan kami.

String.Source: And an assault on the Betrayed guarding the Inner Sanctum would only end with my death.
String.Dest: Dan serangan terhadap The Betrayed yang menjaga Inner Sanctum hanya akan berakhir dengan kematianku.

String.Source: You've served Skyrim well.
String.Dest: Anda telah melayani Skyrim dengan baik.

String.Source: You dare defy your father?!
String.Dest: Berani kau menentang ayahmu?!

String.Source: You've turned her against me!
String.Dest: Kau telah menjadikannya melawanku!

String.Source: The dwarves may have stolen their sight, but it took many generations for them to become what they are today.
String.Dest: Dwarves mungkin telah mencuri penglihatan mereka, tetapi dibutuhkan banyak generasi agar mereka menjadi seperti apa mereka hari ini.

String.Source: But I can see this having its uses. Do you have any elven arrows on you?
String.Dest: Tapi aku bisa melihat ini berguna. Apakah kamu punya anak panah elf?

String.Source: I will resist you, monster. I must!
String.Dest: Aku akan melawanmu, monster. Aku harus!

String.Source: Well met, brother.
String.Dest: Selamat bertemu, saudara.

String.Source: Not only that, but Auriel's Bow is in safe hands.
String.Dest: Tidak hanya itu, tetapi Busur Auriel berada di tangan yang aman.

String.Source: I just hope we weren't too late.
String.Dest: Saya hanya berharap kita tidak terlalu terlambat.

String.Source: And now... I think I can rest. Farewell, my friend, wherever your travels take you.
String.Dest: Dan sekarang... aku rasa aku dapat beristirahat. Selamat tinggal, sahabatku, ke mana pun perjalananmu membawamu.

String.Source: But... what about you?
String.Dest: Tapi... bagaimana denganmu?

String.Source: That's what I wanted to hear.
String.Dest: Itu yang ingin aku dengar.

String.Source: Very funny.
String.Dest: Sangat lucu.

String.Source: I've only heard stories. Not sure if any of them are true.
String.Dest: Aku hanya mendengar cerita-cerita. Tidak yakin apakah ada yang benar.

String.Source: And then preyed on the Rift until finally someone put them down.
String.Dest: Dan kemudian memangsa Rift sampai akhirnya seseorang menundukkan mereka.

String.Source: Oh, I've read a few things. Heard a few more things. Arkay's told me a bit as well.
String.Dest: Oh, aku sudah membaca beberapa hal. Mendengar beberapa hal lagi. Arkay juga memberitahuku sedikit.

String.Source: Farewell, and good journey milady.
String.Dest: Selamat tinggal, semoga perjalanan Anda menyenangkan, Nyonya.

String.Source: And it seems we have a problem.
String.Dest: Dan sepertinya kita memiliki masalah.

String.Source: I'll make you pay for this, daughter!
String.Dest: Aku akan membuatmu membayar atas ini, anak perempuan!

String.Source: I'm sorry, I don't feel comfortable giving them to you.
String.Dest: Maaf, saya tidak merasa nyaman memberikannya kepada Anda.

String.Source: Those vampires put up a hell of a fight.
String.Dest: Para vampir itu memberikan perlawanan yang luar biasa.

String.Source: I really do enjoy killing vampires.
String.Dest: Aku benar-benar menikmati membunuh vampir.

String.Source: I knew you had it in you! Arkay wasn't so sure. Between you and me, I think he didn't expect you to make it.
String.Dest: Aku tahu kau punya potensi itu! Arkay tidak begitu yakin. Antara kamu dan aku, kurasa dia tidak mengira kau akan berhasil.

String.Source: Let's get indoors. Or in a cave. Anywhere, just out of this.
String.Dest: Ayo masuk ke dalam. Atau ke gua. Di mana saja, asalkan menjauh dari ini.

String.Source: You're all talk.
String.Dest: Kamu hanya omong kosong.

String.Source: That I am. So I'm guessing you want to just use my blood, then?
String.Dest: Itu memang saya. Jadi saya menduga Anda hanya ingin menggunakan darah saya, ya?

String.Source: Sure... do you have any arrows, though? They would have to be of elven quality, I'd guess.
String.Dest: Tentu... tapi apakah kau punya anak panah? Mereka harus berkelas elf, kurasa.

String.Source: Isran will never admit it, but I'm sure he's proud of you.
String.Dest: Isran tidak akan pernah mengakuinya, tapi saya yakin dia bangga padamu.

String.Source: (Whine)
String.Dest: (Rintih)

String.Source: I wonder if the horse's remains are around here... someplace.
String.Dest: Aku bertanya-tanya apakah sisa kuda itu ada di sekitar sini... entah di mana.

String.Source: Is that... oh no. Are we going down there?
String.Dest: Apakah itu... oh tidak. Apakah kita akan turun ke sana?

String.Source: This is an intriguing change.
String.Dest: Ini adalah perubahan yang menarik.

String.Source: It's amazing what I'm able to learn from studying these Dwemer plans.
String.Dest: Sungguh menakjubkan apa yang dapat saya pelajari dengan mempelajari rencanaâ€‘rencana Dwemer ini.

String.Source: Even before that, we weren't the most normal family. We did worship a daedra, remember?
String.Dest: Bahkan sebelum itu, kami bukan keluarga yang paling normal. Kami memang menyembah seorang daedra, ingat?

String.Source: Probably not.
String.Dest: Mungkin tidak.

String.Source: We need to do all that nonsense to get into the temple, so we can kill your brother and claim Auriel's Bow?
String.Dest: Kita harus melakukan semua omong kosong itu untuk masuk ke kuil, supaya kita bisa membunuh saudaramu dan mengambil Busur Auriel?

String.Source: I can't help that space is cramped in here, Florentius.
String.Dest: Aku tidak bisa mengubah bahwa ruang di sini sempit, Florentius.

String.Source: It would make you a bit weaker when we travel through the Soul Cairn, but we might be able to fix that once we're inside. Maybe.
String.Dest: Itu akan membuatmu sedikit lemah saat kita melewati Soul Cairn, tapi mungkin kami dapat memperbaikinya setelah kita berada di dalamnya. Mungkin.

String.Source: Vaaz!
String.Dest: Vaaz!

String.Source: If you're here to join up, you need to see Isran. He's up at the fort talking to some Vigilant.
String.Dest: Jika kamu di sini untuk bergabung, kamu harus menemui Isran. Dia berada di benteng dan sedang berbicara dengan beberapa Vigilant.

String.Source: Until the "Betrayed" corrupted you. Yes, yes. We've heard this sad story.
String.Dest: Sampai "Pengkhianat" mengkorupsi kamu. Ya, ya. Kami telah mendengar kisah menyedihkan ini.

String.Source: And now that you've stirred up the vampires against you, you come begging for my protection?
String.Dest: Dan sekarang, setelah kau menghasut para vampir melawannya, kau datang memohon perlindungan dariku?

String.Source: New recruits? Hmm.
String.Dest: Rekrutan baru? Hmm.

String.Source: Glad you decided to give it a try. I hope Isran likes you.
String.Dest: Senang kamu memutuskan untuk mencobanya. Aku harap Isran menyukaimu.

String.Source: The blood of a vampire... Auriel's Bow...
String.Dest: Darah seorang vampir... Busur Auriel...

String.Source: The Vigilants mostly hunt down daedra worshippers, which is why they got torn to pieces when they went up against vampires.
String.Dest: Para Pengawas kebanyakan memburu penyembah Daedra, itulah mengapa mereka hancur berkepingâ€‘keping ketika melawan vampir.

String.Source: You want to take revenge... on a god?
String.Dest: Kau ingin membalas dendam... pada dewa?

String.Source: Yes. By destroying it, the vampires hoped to cripple our order's activities in Skyrim.
String.Dest: Ya. Dengan menghancurkannya, para vampir berharap dapat melemahkan kegiatan ordo kami di Skyrim.

String.Source: Well? Ready to join the fight against the damn vampires?
String.Dest: Yah? Siap bergabung dalam pertempuran melawan para vampir sialan?

String.Source: I'm going to Dimhollow Crypt. Perhaps I can be of some small assistance to you.
String.Dest: Saya akan pergi ke Dimhollow Crypt. Mungkin saya dapat memberikan sedikit bantuan kepada Anda.

String.Source: Here to join the Dawnguard? Good.
String.Dest: Datang untuk bergabung dengan Dawnguard? Baik.

String.Source: Why do I even post guards? This is the headquarters of the Dawnguard. Well, it used to be, a long time ago.
String.Dest: Kenapa aku bahkan menempatkan penjaga? Ini adalah markas Dawnguard. Yah, dulu memang begitu, sudah lama sekali.

String.Source: If you change your mind and decide to join the fight before it's too late, talk to Isran at Fort Dawnguard, southeast of Riften.
String.Dest: Jika kamu berubah pikiran dan memutuskan untuk bergabung dalam pertempuran sebelum terlambat, bicaralah dengan Isran di Fort Dawnguard, tenggara Riften.

String.Source: Uh, crossbow? I've never...
String.Dest: Uh, crossbow? Aku belum pernah...

String.Source: Where is everybody? This place looks almost deserted.
String.Dest: Di mana semua orang? Tempat ini hampir tampak kosong.

String.Source: No... it's not working!
String.Dest: Tidak... ini tidak berhasil!

String.Source: There's an offering altar not terribly far from here. I'm willing to bet that the gem you're looking for is there.
String.Dest: Ada altar persembahan tidak terlalu jauh dari sini. Aku bersedia bertaruh bahwa permata yang kau cari ada di sana.

String.Source: Ha. Those two deserved what they got. Their arrogance had become insufferable.
String.Dest: Ha. Kedua mereka pantas menerima apa yang mereka dapat. Kesombongan mereka telah menjadi tak tertahankan.

String.Source: Are you sure? I'm willing to do it, but you need to think it through.
String.Dest: Apakah kamu yakin? Aku bersedia melakukannya, tetapi kamu harus memikirkannya dengan matang.

String.Source: We didn't listen to him any more than we did Isran. He was at the Hall when it was attacked...
String.Dest: Kami tidak mendengarkan dia lebih daripada kami mendengarkan Isran. Dia berada di Balai ketika tempat itu diserang...

String.Source: But Auriel should have protected you...
String.Dest: Namun Auriel seharusnya melindungi kamu...

String.Source: You're not paying attention then. Like most everyone else around here.
String.Dest: Kamu tidak memperhatikan, ya. Seperti kebanyakan orang lain di sekitar sini.

String.Source: Yeah? You change your mind? The Dawnguard could use somebody like you.
String.Dest: Ya? Kamu berubah pikiran? Dawnguard bisa memanfaatkan seseorang seperti kamu.

String.Source: That's why our leader Isran is reestablishing the Dawnguard. Real, serious vampire hunters.
String.Dest: Itulah mengapa pemimpin kami Isran menegakkan kembali Dawnguard. Pemburu vampir yang nyata dan serius.

String.Source: Feel free to poke around the fort and take what you need. There isn't much yet, but you're welcome to anything you can use.
String.Dest: Silakan menjelajah benteng ini dan ambil apa yang kamu butuhkan. Belum banyak yang ada, tapi kamu dipersilakan mengambil apa saja yang bisa kamu gunakan.

String.Source: If there's anything I can do before you depart, you must let me know.
String.Dest: Jika ada sesuatu yang dapat saya lakukan sebelum Anda berangkat, beritahulah saya.

String.Source: I know this is difficult for you. I hope you trust me.
String.Dest: Aku tahu ini sulit bagimu. Aku harap kau mempercayai aku.

String.Source: Isran's inside the fort. He's the one you need to talk to.
String.Dest: Isran berada di dalam benteng. Dia orang yang harus kamu ajak bicara.

String.Source: Talk to Isran. He'll decide if he wants you for the Dawnguard.
String.Dest: Bicaralah dengan Isran. Dia akan memutuskan apakah ia menginginkanmu untuk bergabung dengan Dawnguard.

String.Source: Look, I'll be honest with you. I have no idea. But I'm sure we can find something worth your time.
String.Dest: Dengar, aku jujur padamu. Aku sama sekali tidak tahu. Tapi aku yakin kita bisa menemukan sesuatu yang layak untuk waktumu.

String.Source: Stay here. I'll go check it out if you open the door back up.
String.Dest: Tunggu di sini. Aku akan pergi memeriksanya kalau kamu membuka pintu lagi.

String.Source: You there, boy. Stop skulking in the shadows and step up here. What's your name?
String.Dest: Kau di sana, nak. Berhenti bersembunyi di bayangan dan datang ke sini. Siapa namamu?

String.Source: You know why I'm here. The Vigilants are under attack everywhere. The vampires are much more dangerous than we believed.
String.Dest: Kau tahu mengapa aku di sini. Para Vigilant diserang di mana-mana. Para vampir jauh lebih berbahaya daripada yang kami percayai.

String.Source: Go on inside. Isran'll want to talk to you.
String.Dest: Masuklah. Isran ingin berbicara denganmu.

String.Source: I suspect now it was Brother Adalvald's journals they were after. He was obsessed with ancient vampire artifacts and burial sites.
String.Dest: Saya curiga sekarang bahwa yang mereka cari adalah jurnal Biarawan Adalvald. Dia terobsesi dengan artefak vampir kuno dan situs pemakaman.

String.Source: I remember Keeper Carcette telling me repeatedly that Fort Dawnguard is a crumbling ruin, not worth the expense and manpower to repair.
String.Dest: Aku ingat Keeper Carcette terus-menerus memberitahuku bahwa Fort Dawnguard adalah reruntuhan yang rapuh, tidak layak dikeluarkan biaya dan tenaga untuk memperbaikinya.

String.Source: Potions my friend, potions! Possibly some spells. Maybe some other things I've forgotten about. Actually I'm not sure. Let's see, shall we?
String.Dest: potions temanku, potions! Mungkin ada beberapa spells. Mungkin ada halâ€‘hal lain yang aku lupakan. Sebenarnya aku tidak yakin. Mari kita lihat, ya?

String.Source: Let's not waste any more time then.
String.Dest: Jangan buang waktu lagi.

String.Source: Don't worry, I think I can help you.
String.Dest: Jangan khawatir, saya pikir saya bisa membantu Anda.

String.Source: Didn't I tell you to step forward? Hmm... Farm boy, eh? What's your weapon?
String.Dest: Bukankah aku sudah menyuruhmu maju? Hmm... Anak petani, ya? Apa senjatamu?

String.Source: So my daughter applied some of the lessons I taught her about necromancy, did she?
String.Dest: Jadi, anak perempuanku menerapkan beberapa pelajaran yang kuajarkan tentang nekromansi, bukan?

String.Source: Gelebor and his kind are easily manipulated fools.
String.Dest: Gelebor dan kaumnya mudah dimanipulasi, para bodoh.

String.Source: Is there anything else? Could be your last chance.
String.Dest: Apakah ada hal lain? Mungkin ini adalah kesempatan terakhirmu.

String.Source: Which is where you come in. If killing vampires sounds good to you, go talk to Isran up in the fort. He decides who's Dawnguard material.
String.Dest: Itulah tempatmu terlibat. Jika membunuh vampir terdengar menarik bagimu, pergilah berbicara dengan Isran di benteng itu. Dia menentukan siapa yang layak menjadi anggota Dawnguard.

String.Source: Report to Isran at Fort Dawnguard. And get moving if you're serious about it. The vampires aren't going to wait around to make their next move.
String.Dest: Lapor kepada Isran di Fort Dawnguard. Dan segera bergerak jika kau serius menanganinya. Para vampir tidak akan menunggu untuk melancarkan langkah selanjutnya mereka.

String.Source: The bow! Use the bow!
String.Dest: Busur! Gunakan busur!

String.Source: You simply need to retrieve the gem. The moment you touch it, your soul essence will be restored.
String.Dest: Anda hanya perlu mengambil permata itu. Begitu Anda menyentuhnya, esensi jiwa Anda akan dipulihkan.

String.Source: You wouldn't dare. Now shut up and keep on watch.
String.Dest: Kau tidak berani. Sekarang diam dan tetap berjaga.

String.Source: Which is where you come in. If killing vampires sounds good to you, come talk to Isran at Fort Dawnguard, southeast of Riften.
String.Dest: Itulah tempat kamu terlibat. Jika membunuh vampir terdengar baik bagimu, datang bicara dengan Isran di Fort Dawnguard, di tenggara Riften.

String.Source: To come in here alone... a fool like all the rest of them.
String.Dest: Masuk ke sini sendirian... bodoh seperti semua yang lain.

String.Source: Tolan, I don't think that's a good idea.
String.Dest: Tolan, aku tidak pikir itu ide yang bagus.

String.Source: Isran was right all along. We should have listened to his warnings. It's too late for the Vigilants now.
String.Dest: Isran benar sejak awal. Kami seharusnya mendengarkan peringatannya. Sudah terlambat bagi Vigilants sekarang.

String.Source: If you change your mind and decide to join the fight before it's too late, go talk to Isran up in the fort.
String.Dest: Jika kamu berubah pikiran dan memutuskan untuk bergabung dalam pertarungan sebelum terlambat, pergilah berbicara dengan Isran di atas benteng.

String.Source: All this talk is making me thirsty. Perhaps another Vigilant will wander in soon.
String.Dest: Semua omongan ini membuatku haus. Mungkin ada Vigilant lain yang akan datang lagi segera.

String.Source: I wish Lokil would hurry it up. I have half a mind to return to the castle and tell Harkon what a fool he's entrusted this mission to.
String.Dest: Saya harap Lokil segera mempercepatnya. Saya hampir saja kembali ke istana dan memberi tahu Harkon betapa bodohnya orang yang mempercayakan misi ini kepadanya.

String.Source: Yes, a crossbow. Best thing for killing vampires. Just take a few shots at those crates over there.
String.Dest: Ya, sebuah busur silang. Hal terbaik untuk membunuh vampir. Tembakkan beberapa tembakan ke peti-peti di sana.

String.Source: And I have half a mind to tell Lokil of your disloyalty.
String.Dest: Dan saya hampir saja memberi tahu Lokil tentang ketidaksetiaanmu.

String.Source: Your soul essence was trapped inside a gem. When you and Serana entered the Soul Cairn, it was "given" to the Ideal Masters as payment.
String.Dest: Esensi jiwa Anda terperangkap di dalam sebuah permata. Saat Anda dan Serana memasuki Soul Cairn, itu "diberikan" kepada Ideal Masters sebagai pembayaran.

String.Source: You heard right. I'm glad word's finally starting to get around. But that means it won't be long before the vampires start to take notice as well.
String.Dest: Kau mendengar dengan benar. Aku senang berita itu akhirnya mulai tersebar. Tapi itu berarti tidak akan lama sebelum para vampir mulai memperhatikan juga.

String.Source: You Vigilants were never trained for...
String.Dest: Kamu Para Pengawas tidak pernah dilatih untuk...

String.Source: Why are you here, Tolan? The Vigilants and I were finished with each other a long time ago.
String.Dest: Kenapa kau di sini, Tolan? Aku dan Vigilants sudah selesai satu sama lain sejak lama.

String.Source: The Hall of the Vigilants is in ruins, my brothers and sisters dead or scattered.
String.Dest: Balai Para Penjaga berada dalam reruntuhan, saudara-saudaraku telah mati atau tersebar.

String.Source: Uh, my weapon? I mostly just use my pa's axe, when wolves are attacking the goats or something.
String.Dest: Uh, senjataku? Aku biasanya hanya pakai kapak pa-ku, ketika serigala menyerang kambing atau semacamnya.

String.Source: Dimhollow Crypt. Brother Adalvald thought it contained some long-lost vampire artifact. It seems he was right.
String.Dest: Dimhollow Crypt. Brother Adalvald pikir itu berisi artefak vampir yang telah lama hilang. Tampaknya dia benar.

String.Source: My mother taught me a trick or two. I could partially soul trap you, and offer that gem to the Ideal Masters. It might be enough to satisfy them.
String.Dest: Ibuku mengajarku satu atau dua trik. Aku bisa sebagian menjebak jiwamu, lalu menawarkan permata itu kepada Ideal Masters. Mungkin itu cukup untuk memuaskan mereka.

String.Source: Fools.
String.Dest: Orang bodoh.

String.Source: I understand. Take your time.
String.Dest: Saya mengerti. Silakan ambil waktumu.

String.Source: Thank you.
String.Dest: Terima kasih.

String.Source: You were waiting... all this time for someone with my blood to come along.
String.Dest: Kau menunggu... selama ini menunggu seseorang yang memiliki darah sepertiku datang.

String.Source: I guess I'll see you at Fort Dawnguard.
String.Dest: Kurasa aku akan bertemu kamu di Fort Dawnguard.

String.Source: Oh. Good.
String.Dest: Oh. Baik.

String.Source: Well, too bad for you... I intend on keeping it. Let's see if your blood has any power to it!
String.Dest: Ya, sayang sekali bagimu... Aku berencana untuk menyimpannya. Mari lihat apakah darahmu memiliki kekuatan!

String.Source: As you wish.
String.Dest: Seperti yang kau kehendaki.

String.Source: How dare you. I was the Arch-Curate of Auri-El, girl. I had the ears of a god!
String.Dest: Beraninya kau. Aku dulu adalah Arch-Curate Auri-El, gadis. Aku memiliki telinga seorang dewa!

String.Source: I promise to make this as painless as possible. Hold still.
String.Dest: Saya berjanji akan membuat ini sesedikit mungkin menyakitkan. Tetap diam.

String.Source: Now that you've retrieved the Elder Scroll, you should be on your way.
String.Dest: Sekarang karena kamu telah mengambil Gulungan Elder, kamu seharusnya melanjutkan perjalananmu.

String.Source: Break his shield! Hurry!
String.Dest: Hancurkan perisainya! Cepat!

String.Source: We're vampire hunters. We search out and destroy those bloodsucking scum wherever we find them.
String.Dest: Kami pemburu vampir. Kami mencari dan menghancurkan bajingan penghisap darah itu di mana pun kami menemukannya.

String.Source: Yes, well... I never wanted any of this to happen. I tried to warn all of you... I am sorry, you know.
String.Dest: Ya, yah... Aku tidak pernah menginginkan semua ini terjadi. Aku berusaha memperingatkan kalian semua... Maaf, kau tahu.

String.Source: Stendarr grant that you do not have to face the same test and be found wanting.
String.Dest: Stendarr mengizinkanmu untuk tidak harus menghadapi ujian yang sama dan tidak dianggap kurang.

String.Source: I'd never do anything that could hurt you.
String.Dest: Aku tidak akan pernah melakukan apa pun yang bisa melukaimu.

String.Source: While you're thinking about it, the vampires will be gathering strength in the shadows, waiting to strike.
String.Dest: Sementara kamu memikirkannya, para vampir akan mengumpulkan kekuatan di bayangâ€‘bayang, menunggu untuk menyerang.

String.Source: Ha. Isran's going to like you. He's up the hill in the fort. He'll decide if you're Dawnguard material.
String.Dest: Ha. Isran akan menyukaimu. Dia berada di atas bukit di benteng. Dia akan memutuskan apakah kamu bahan Dawnguard.

String.Source: Look into my eyes, Serana. You tell me what I am.
String.Dest: Tatap mataku, Serana. Katakan padaku apa aku ini.

String.Source: Quick, the bow!
String.Dest: Cepat, busur!

String.Source: Isran will decide if you've got what it takes. Go on, he's right inside.
String.Dest: Isran akan memutuskan apakah kamu memiliki apa yang diperlukan. Ayo, dia tepat di dalam.

String.Source: Oh, hey there! You here to join the Dawnguard, too?
String.Dest: Oh, hai! Kamu di sini untuk bergabung dengan Dawnguard juga?

String.Source: Yeargh!
String.Dest: Aduh!

String.Source: Oh, well... some... things, I suppose. Remedies, cures, a poison or two.
String.Dest: Oh, yah... beberapa... hal, kurasa. Obat-obatan, penyembuh, satu atau dua racun.

String.Source: Tolan, tell him about, what was it, Dimhollow?
String.Dest: Tolan, beri tahu dia tentang, apa itu, Dimhollow?

String.Source: Enough, Vyrthur. Give us the bow!
String.Dest: Cukup, Vyrthur. Berikan busur itu kepada kami!

String.Source: You've probably killed lots of vampires, huh? I'm sure Isran will sign you right up. Not sure he'll take me. I hope so.
String.Dest: Kamu pasti sudah membunuh banyak vampir, kan? Aku yakin Isran akan langsung menandatanganimu. Tidak yakin dia akan menerima aku. Aku harap begitu.

String.Source: And now you want to come running to safety with the Dawnguard, is that it?
String.Dest: Dan sekarang kamu ingin berlari ke tempat yang aman bersama Dawnguard, begitu?

String.Source: Isran, Carcette is dead. The Hall of the Vigilants... everyone... they're all dead. You were right, we were wrong. Isn't that enough for you?
String.Dest: Isran, Carcette sudah mati. Hall of the Vigilants... semua orang... mereka semua sudah mati. Kau benar, kami salah. Bukankah itu sudah cukup bagimu?

String.Source: But look around - there's really not much to join yet. I've only just started rebuilding the order.
String.Dest: Tapi lihat sekeliling - belum banyak yang bisa diikuti sekarang. Saya baru saja mulai membangun kembali ordo tersebut.

String.Source: I swore I'd have my revenge, no matter what the cost.
String.Dest: Aku bersumpah akan membalas dendam, tak peduli berapa pun biayanya.

String.Source: A prophecy that lacked a single, final ingredient... the blood of a pure vampire. The blood of a Daughter of Coldharbour.
String.Dest: Sebuah ramalan yang kehilangan satu bahan terakhir... darah seorang vampir murni. Darah seorang Putri Coldharbour.

String.Source: It... it was you? You created that prophecy?
String.Dest: It... itu kau? Kau menciptakan ramalan itu?

String.Source: So who are you? What do you want?
String.Dest: Jadi, siapa kau? Apa yang kau inginkan?

String.Source: As you can see, we have some work to do to restore it to its former glory. But maybe you want to help me with that?
String.Dest: Seperti yang Anda lihat, kami memiliki beberapa pekerjaan untuk mengembalikannya ke kejayaan masa lalunya. Namun mungkin Anda ingin membantu saya dengan hal itu?

String.Source: I'm, uh... my name is Agmaer, sir.
String.Dest: Saya, eh... nama saya Agmaer, pak.

String.Source: That must be it. Fort Dawnguard... Wow. Bigger than I expected.
String.Dest: Itu pasti. Fort Dawnguard... Wow. Lebih besar daripada yang saya harapkan.

String.Source: Yes, that's it. Dimhollow Crypt. Brother Adalvald was sure it held some long-lost vampire artifact of some kind.
String.Dest: Ya, itu dia. Dimhollow Crypt. Saudara Adalvald yakin bahwa di sana terdapat artefak vampir yang sudah lama hilang, semacamnya.

String.Source: Hey, uh, don't tell Isran I was afraid to meet him by myself. Not the best first impression for a new vampire hunter, I guess.
String.Dest: Hei, eh, jangan beri tahu Isran kalau aku takut menemuinya sendirian. Bukan kesan pertama yang terbaik untuk pemburu vampir baru, kurasa.

String.Source: Tolan, tell her about, what was it, Dimhollow?
String.Dest: Tolan, beri tahu dia tentang, apa itu, Dimhollow?

String.Source: Ha. Isran's going to like you. Go talk to him at Fort Dawnguard, southeast of Riften. He'll decide if you're Dawnguard material.
String.Dest: Ha. Isran akan menyukaimu. Pergi dan berbicaralah dengannya di Fort Dawnguard, tenggara Riften. Dia akan memutuskan apakah kamu cocok untuk Dawnguard.

String.Source: You're... you're a vampire?
String.Dest: Kau... kau vampir?

String.Source: Haven't you heard that the Hall of the Vigilants was destroyed by vampires? They never took the threat seriously, and now they've paid the price.
String.Dest: Apakah kau belum mendengar bahwa Hall of the Vigilants telah dihancurkan oleh vampir? Mereka tidak pernah menganggap ancaman itu serius, dan sekarang mereka membayar harganya.

String.Source: Do I look like a "sir" to you, boy? I'm not a soldier, and you're not joining the army.
String.Dest: Kau pikir aku kayak "sir" gitu, bocah? Aku bukan Soldier, dan kamu gak akan masuk militer.

String.Source: I know what you think of us. You think we're soft, that we're cowards. You think our deaths proved our weakness.
String.Dest: Aku tahu apa yang kau pikirkan tentang kami. Kau menganggap kami lemah, bahwa kami pengecut. Kau berpikir kematian kami membuktikan kelemahan kami.

String.Source: That's good enough for me. Go see what the vampires were looking for in this Dimhollow Crypt. With any luck, they'll still be there.
String.Dest: Itu cukup baik bagi saya. Pergi lihat apa yang sedang dicari vampir di Dimhollow Crypt. Semoga mereka masih berada di sana.

String.Source: You there. The Dawnguard is looking for anyone willing to fight against the growing vampire menace. What do you say?
String.Dest: Kau di sana. Dawnguard sedang mencari siapa pun yang bersedia melawan ancaman vampir yang semakin berkembang. Apa katamu?

String.Source: You'll remain mortal, but you'll find yourself weakened within the Soul Cairn.
String.Dest: Engkau akan tetap fana, namun engkau akan menemukan dirimu lemah di dalam Soul Cairn.

String.Source: Got a fire in your belly to kill vampires, eh? Good for you.
String.Dest: Kamu punya semangat membara untuk membunuh vampir, ya? Bagus buatmu.

String.Source: (Whine)
String.Dest: (Rintih)

String.Source: I'll meet you in Dimhollow Crypt. I owe these vampires a debt of vengeance.
String.Dest: Aku akan menemuimu di Dimhollow Crypt. Aku berhutang balas dendam pada vampir-vampir ini.

String.Source: "My pa's axe", Stendarr preserve us.
String.Dest: "Kapak ayahku", Stendarr lindungilah kami.

String.Source: The vampires are much more dangerous than we ever dreamed. The Dawnguard is the only hope now.
String.Dest: Para vampir jauh lebih berbahaya daripada yang pernah kami impikan. Dawnguard adalah satu-satunya harapan sekarang.

String.Source: Auri-El himself may have been beyond my reach, but his influence on our world wasn't.
String.Dest: Auri-El sendiri mungkin berada di luar jangkauanku, tetapi pengaruhnya terhadap dunia kita tidak.

String.Source: The moment I was infected by one of my own Initiates, Auri-El turned his back on me.
String.Dest: Pada saat saya terinfeksi oleh salah satu Inisiator saya, Auri-El membelakangi saya.

String.Source: Truth is, I'm a little nervous. I've never done anything like this before. I hope you don't mind if I walk up with you.
String.Dest: Sejujurnya, saya agak gugup. Saya belum pernah melakukan hal seperti ini sebelumnya. Saya harap Anda tidak keberatan kalau saya berjalan bersama Anda.

String.Source: He fought well though. Jeron and Bresoth were no match for him.
String.Dest: Dia bertarung dengan baik, meskipun Jeron dan Bresoth tidak sebanding dengannya.

String.Source: All I needed was the blood of a vampire and his own weapon, Auriel's Bow.
String.Dest: Semua yang saya butuhkan hanyalah darah seorang vampir dan senjatanya sendiri, Busur Auriel.

String.Source: I'll meet you at Dimhollow. It's the least I can do to avenge my fallen comrades.
String.Dest: Aku akan bertemu denganmu di Dimhollow. Itu hal paling sedikit yang bisa kulakukan untuk membalas dendam atas rekan-rekan yang gugur.

String.Source: Don't worry, I think we can make a Dawnguard out of you. Here, take this crossbow and let's see how you shoot.
String.Dest: Jangan khawatir, aku rasa kita bisa menjadikanmu anggota Dawnguard. Ini, ambil crossbow ini dan mari kita lihat bagaimana kamu menembaknya.

String.Source: Yes, si... Isran.
String.Dest: Ya, tuan... Isran.

String.Source: You are testing my patience.
String.Dest: Anda sedang menguji kesabaran saya.

String.Source: Leave me in peace.
String.Dest: Biarkan aku dalam damai.

String.Source: When you first transform into a Vampire Lord, you will hover in the air. While you do, you will command the powers of Blood and Night.
String.Dest: Ketika Anda pertama kali berubah menjadi Vampire Lord, Anda akan melayang di udara. Selama itu, Anda akan memerintah Powers of Blood and Night.

String.Source: You should find no difficulty using the portal any longer.
String.Dest: Anda seharusnya tidak mengalami kesulitan lagi saat menggunakan portal itu.

String.Source: Now that the Dawnguard are back, the vampires' reign of terror is about to end.
String.Dest: Sekarang Dawnguard kembali, masa teror para vampir akan segera berakhir.

String.Source: I have everything I need right here.
String.Dest: Saya memiliki semua yang saya butuhkan di sini.

String.Source: Are you sure that was wise, Lokil? He still might have told us something.
String.Dest: Apakah kamu yakin itu bijaksana, Lokil? Dia mungkin masih memberi tahu kami sesuatu.

String.Source: It's over. He's dead, and the prophecy dies with him.
String.Dest: Sudah selesai. Dia sudah mati, dan ramalan itu mati bersamanya.

String.Source: He was out of control, Garan. It had to be done.
String.Dest: Dia tidak terkendali, Garan. Itu harus dilakukan.

String.Source: Way I hear it, Lady Serana's been gone a real long time.
String.Dest: Sejauh yang saya dengar, Lady Serana sudah lama pergi.

String.Source: There's plenty for all.
String.Dest: Ada banyak untuk semua.

String.Source: May Auri-El's glow shield you from your enemy.
String.Dest: Semoga cahaya Auri-El melindungi Anda dari musuh Anda.

String.Source: You think I can't tell my own kind? I smelled you almost before my eyes were open.
String.Dest: Kau pikir aku tidak bisa mengenali sesama ku? Aku hampir mencium baumu sebelum mataku terbuka.

String.Source: I'll be here. Don't take too long, now!
String.Dest: Aku akan di sini. Jangan terlalu lama, ya!

String.Source: Not fond of vampires, are they?
String.Dest: Tidak begitu menyukai vampir, ya?

String.Source: First thing is to get this fort back into shape. Right now, a vampire could practically walk right in the front door.
String.Dest: Hal pertama adalah mengembalikan benteng ini ke bentuk semula. Saat ini, vampir hampir bisa melangkah masuk lewat pintu depan.

String.Source: Now I'm trying to reestablish the Dawnguard. Take the fight to the vampires for a change. I hope it isn't too late.
String.Dest: Sekarang saya berusaha mendirikan kembali Dawnguard. Bawa pertempuran ke para vampir untuk sekali ini. Saya harap belum terlambat.

String.Source: I knew I heard something!
String.Dest: Aku tahu, aku mendengar sesuatu!

String.Source: Well I don't know what that means. But we need to find out. She must either have something the vampires want, or be someone important to them.
String.Dest: Yah, aku tidak tahu apa artinya. Tapi kami harus mencari tahu. Dia pasti memiliki sesuatu yang diinginkan para vampir, atau menjadi seseorang yang penting bagi mereka.

String.Source: We hunt down and kill vampires. Haven't you been paying attention?
String.Dest: Kami memburu dan membunuh vampir. Bukankah kamu sudah memperhatikan?

String.Source: I don't like the feel of this place. I'll wait for you back by the entrance.
String.Dest: Aku tidak suka suasana tempat ini. Aku akan menunggumu kembali di pintu masuk.

String.Source: Present yourself to Lord Harkon at once.
String.Dest: Hadirlah segera di hadapan Lord Harkon.

String.Source: I'm glad we're finally taking the fight to those monsters.
String.Dest: Saya senang akhirnya kita menyerang monsterâ€‘monster itu.

String.Source: We haven't gotten anywhere ourselves with...
String.Dest: Kami belum mencapai apa-apa sendiri dengan...

String.Source: Disgusting creatures.
String.Dest: Makhluk menjijikkan.

String.Source: I'd... well, I'd come with you, but I don't know if I can trust your friend.
String.Dest: Aku... yah, aku akan ikut bersamamu, tapi aku tidak yakin apakah aku bisa mempercayai temanmu.

String.Source: Who said something, Sorine or Gunmar? I thought they'd have learned their lesson by now.
String.Dest: Siapa yang berkata sesuatu, Sorine atau Gunmar? Aku pikir mereka sudah belajar pelajarannya sekarang.

String.Source: There you are, father!
String.Dest: Di sini kau, ayah!

String.Source: Yes, of course Lokil. Do not forget who brought you news of the Vigilants' discovery.
String.Dest: Ya, tentu saja Lokil. Jangan lupa siapa yang memberi Anda berita tentang penemuan para Vigilants.

String.Source: Look out! Gargoyles!
String.Dest: Awas! Gargoyle!

String.Source: I suppose she's right. I shouldn't let my personal feelings get in the way.
String.Dest: Saya kira dia benar. Saya tidak seharusnya membiarkan perasaan pribadi saya menghalangi.

String.Source: Well I don't know what that means. But we need to find out. She must either have something the vampires want, or be someone important to them.
String.Dest: Yah, aku tidak tahu apa artinya. Tapi kami harus mencari tahu. Dia pasti memiliki sesuatu yang diinginkan para vampir, atau menjadi seseorang yang penting bagi mereka.

String.Source: It's time for you to suffer!
String.Dest: Sudah saatnya kau menderita!

String.Source: Isran knows how to fight those monsters. He's been preparing for this day for a long time.
String.Dest: Isran tahu cara melawan monsterâ€‘monster itu. Dia telah menyiapkan hari ini sejak lama.

String.Source: Tough day for you!
String.Dest: Hari yang berat untukmu!

String.Source: He's a... powerful man. Or at least used to be.
String.Dest: Dia seorang... pria yang kuat. Atau setidaknya dulu begitu.

String.Source: So they have everything they wanted, and we're left with nothing.
String.Dest: Jadi mereka telah memperoleh semua yang mereka inginkan, sementara kami tidak memiliki apaâ€‘apa.

String.Source: Harkon will reward us richly for this.
String.Dest: Harkon akan memberi kami hadiah yang melimpah untuk ini.

String.Source: I won't fall for your tricks!
String.Dest: Aku tidak akan terjebak oleh tipuanmu!

String.Source: Lord Harkon, defeated. I never imagined I'd see the day.
String.Dest: Lord Harkon, terkalahkan. Saya tidak pernah membayangkan saya akan melihat hari itu.

String.Source: Yes, it is, and it's mine.
String.Dest: Ya, memang begitu, dan itu milikku.

String.Source: Did you at least find out what the vampires were looking for in there?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu setidaknya menemukan apa yang dicari para vampir di sana?

String.Source: Another adventure.
String.Dest: Petualangan lain.

String.Source: As you've been traveling in the Soul Cairn, your body has become attuned to it.
String.Dest: Seiring kamu menjelajah di Soul Cairn, tubuhmu menjadi selaras dengannya.

String.Source: I just don't feel comfortable sharing that moment with a total stranger, I'm sorry.
String.Dest: Aku tidak merasa nyaman membagikan momen itu dengan orang yang benar-benar asing, maaf.

String.Source: But this is something different. I'd say do what she wants. Take her home, and see who else is in this castle.
String.Dest: Tapi ini sesuatu yang berbeda. Aku rasa lakukan apa yang dia inginkan. Bawa dia pulang, dan lihat siapa lagi yang ada di kastil ini.

String.Source: My family used to live on an island to the west of Solitude. I would guess they still do.
String.Dest: Keluargaku dulu tinggal di sebuah pulau di barat Solitude. Aku rasa mereka masih tinggal di sana.

String.Source: You fight worse than you smell!
String.Dest: Kau bertarung lebih jelek daripada baumu!

String.Source: Go now, and carry out this task. This is my command!
String.Dest: Pergilah sekarang, dan laksanakan tugas ini. Ini perintahku!

String.Source: That's it? All right.
String.Dest: Hanya itu? Baiklah.

String.Source: Back to dust!
String.Dest: Kembali menjadi debu!

String.Source: Arvak...You saved him! His soul is free, I can feel it!
String.Dest: Arvak... Kau menyelamatkannya! Jiwanya bebas, aku dapat merasakannya!

String.Source: This won't end well for you!
String.Dest: Ini tidak akan berakhir baik bagimu!

String.Source: If he can maintain some appearance of normalcy, I'll allow him to stay.
String.Dest: Jika dia dapat mempertahankan penampilan normal, saya akan mengizinkannya tetap tinggal.

String.Source: What now?
String.Dest: Apa selanjutnya?

String.Source: A final warning... be wary, for you can only hold your Vampire Lord form for a brief time.
String.Dest: Sebuah Warning terakhir... berhati-hatilah, karena kamu hanya dapat mempertahankan bentuk Vampire Lord-mu untuk waktu singkat.

String.Source: Is he... like me?
String.Dest: Apakah dia... seperti aku?

String.Source: That's what everybody says, right up until they find their throat being ripped out by a pack of hungry vampires.
String.Dest: Itulah yang semua orang katakan, sampai mereka menemukan tenggorokannya dirobek oleh sekawanan vampir kelaparan.

String.Source: What do you need?
String.Dest: Apa yang kamu butuhkan?

String.Source: May Auri-El's light guide you in your darkest hours.
String.Dest: Semoga cahaya Auri-El membimbingmu di saat-saat tergelap.

String.Source: I just need to be alone. For a while. There's a lot of feelings wrapped up in this old place, and I don't think you're quite ready for them.
String.Dest: Aku hanya butuh bersendirian. Untuk sementara. Ada banyak perasaan yang terbungkus di tempat tua ini, dan aku rasa kau belum siap menghadapinya.

String.Source: So go and meet your beloved Stendarr.
String.Dest: Jadi pergilah dan temui Stendarr tercinta mu.

String.Source: That's... complicated. And I'm not totally sure if I can trust you.
String.Dest: Itu... rumit. Dan aku tidak sepenuhnya yakin apakah aku dapat mempercayaimu.

String.Source: I don't want to step on anyone's toes. Come back to me when you're alone.
String.Dest: Saya tidak ingin mengganggu siapa pun. Kembalilah padaku ketika kau sendirian.

String.Source: I suppose you're lucky you're not dead. Or worse, one of them.
String.Dest: Kupikir kamu beruntung masih tidak mati. Atau lebih buruk, menjadi salah satu dari mereka.

String.Source: Don't let me stand in your way, then.
String.Dest: Jangan biarkan aku menghalangi jalanmu, ya.

String.Source: I think it is, actually.
String.Dest: Sebenarnya, saya pikir itu.

String.Source: That is all I have to teach you. If you wish to be reminded of these lessons, you need only ask.
String.Dest: Itu saja yang dapat saya ajarkan kepadamu. Jika kau ingin diingatkan tentang pelajaran ini, cukup tanyakan saja.

String.Source: Vampire, yes.
String.Dest: Vampir, ya.

String.Source: Not until you get rid of whoever your other friend is.
String.Dest: Tidak sampai kamu menyingkirkan siapa pun teman lainmu.

String.Source: Come on, stoneskin!
String.Dest: Ayo, stoneskin!

String.Source: Good. I assume you took care of that little infestation. Did you figure out what they were looking for in there?
String.Dest: Bagus. Saya mengasumsikan Anda sudah menangani infestasi kecil itu. Apakah Anda menemukan apa yang mereka cari di sana?

String.Source: I have a task that will test your new powers, but first, do you have any questions?
String.Dest: Saya memiliki tugas yang akan menguji Powers baru Anda, tetapi terlebih dahulu, apakah Anda memiliki pertanyaan?

String.Source: Where did you get to?
String.Dest: Ke mana kau pergi?

String.Source: Never seen a crossbow before, eh? Not surprised. Kind of a Dawnguard specialty. Nothing better for putting down vampires.
String.Dest: Belum pernah lihat busur silang sebelumnya, ya? Gak heran. Itu memang spesialisasi Dawnguard. Tidak ada yang lebih baik untuk menumpas vampir.

String.Source: Got it.
String.Dest: Mengerti.

String.Source: Oh no you don't!
String.Dest: Oh tidak, kau tidak boleh!

String.Source: I'm not going to waste my time making sure your friend doesn't get killed. When it's just you and me, we can go.
String.Dest: Aku tidak akan menyia-nyiakan waktu memastikan temanmu tidak terbunuh. Saat hanya ada kamu dan aku, kita bisa pergi.

String.Source: Goodbye, hero! Take good care of Arvak for me! Such a good horse...
String.Dest: Selamat tinggal, pahlawan! Rawatlah Arvak dengan baik untukku! Kuda yang sangat baik...

String.Source: I need someone out in the field, taking the fight to the damn vampires, while we're getting the fort back into shape...
String.Dest: Saya butuh seseorang di lapangan, yang melawan para vampir sial itu, sementara kami memperbaiki benteng ini...

String.Source: Descend to the ground, and you can attack with your claws and feed upon your prey to regain your strength.
String.Dest: Turun ke tanah, dan kau dapat menyerang dengan cakarmu serta memakan mangsamu untuk memulihkan kekuatanmu.

String.Source: Done and done.
String.Dest: Sudah selesai.

String.Source: Perhaps you should. I count some of the oldest and most powerful vampires in Skyrim among the members of my court.
String.Dest: Mungkin Anda sebaiknya melakukannya. Saya menghitung beberapa vampir tertua dan paling kuat di Skyrim termasuk di antara anggota pengadilan saya.

String.Source: I don't think the vampires would be stupid enough to attack us here, but you never know.
String.Dest: Aku tidak pikir vampir akan cukup bodoh untuk menyerang kami di sini, tapi kau tak pernah tahu.

String.Source: Could you tell your companion to head home?
String.Dest: Bisakah kamu menyuruh temanmu untuk pulang?

String.Source: I will find you. Then you will beg me to let you die.
String.Dest: Aku akan menemukanmu. Kemudian kau akan memohon kepadaku agar kau diizinkan mati.

String.Source: I hope the vampires try to attack us here. A lot easier than hunting them down in their holes.
String.Dest: Saya berharap vampir mencoba menyerang kami di sini. Jauh lebih mudah daripada memburu mereka di lubang mereka.

String.Source: A woman? Trapped in there? That doesn't make any sense. Who is she? More importantly, where is she?
String.Dest: Seorang wanita? Terperangkap di sana? Itu tidak masuk akal. Siapa dia? Lebih penting lagi, di mana dia?

String.Source: Die Dawnguard!
String.Dest: Mati, Dawnguard!

String.Source: May Auri-El's radiance fill your heart with joy.
String.Dest: Semoga cahaya Auri-El mengisi hatimu dengan kegembiraan.

String.Source: I don't think so.
String.Dest: Saya rasa tidak.

String.Source: That's not a name I know. And it doesn't sound like a name a group of vampires would choose.
String.Dest: Itu bukan nama yang saya kenal. Dan tidak terdengar seperti nama yang akan dipilih oleh sekelompok vampir.

String.Source: And frankly, I need to get home to figure out what's happening.
String.Dest: Dan jujur saja, aku harus pulang untuk mencari tahu apa yang sedang terjadi.

String.Source: We're going to a place I've never been... and we're goind to see my mother. After all these years.
String.Dest: Kita akan pergi ke sebuah tempat yang belum pernah kukunjungi... dan kita akan menemui ibuku. Setelah semua tahun ini.

String.Source: I'm not going to die like this!
String.Dest: Aku tidak akan mati seperti ini!

String.Source: You're not getting the best of me!
String.Dest: Kau tidak akan mengalahkanku!

String.Source: He'll help you get around this wretched place, but I'm sure he'd be much happier someplace sunnier.
String.Dest: Dia akan membantu kamu menjelajah tempat menjijikkan ini, tapi aku yakin dia akan jauh lebih bahagia di tempat yang lebih cerah.

String.Source: Feed upon those who are sleeping, and your vulnerability to sunlight will diminish along with your powers.
String.Dest: Makanlah mereka yang sedang tidur, dan kerentananmu terhadap sinar matahari akan berkurang bersama Powers.

String.Source: It's only for Serana's sake that I have let you live.
String.Dest: Hanya demi Serana aku membiarkanmu hidup.

String.Source: But I have something for you to do, since you're asking.
String.Dest: Tapi aku punya sesuatu untuk kamu lakukan, karena kamu menanyakan.

String.Source: I... don't know who that is.
String.Dest: Aku... tidak tahu siapa itu.

String.Source: Over time, your powers will grow in strength and you will find new ways to use your gifts.
String.Dest: Seiring berjalannya waktu, Powers Anda akan semakin kuat dan Anda akan menemukan caraâ€‘cara baru untuk memanfaatkan hadiah Anda.

String.Source: You would dare address me?
String.Dest: Kau berani menujuk kepadaku?

String.Source: I guess this is it. Wish me luck.
String.Dest: Kurasa ini sudah selesai. Doakan aku agar beruntung.

String.Source: Not just vampires. We are among the oldest and most powerful vampires in Skyrim.
String.Dest: Bukan hanya vampir. Kami termasuk yang tertua dan terkuat di Skyrim.

String.Source: Got to keep alert. We don't want to get caught napping like the Vigilants did.
String.Dest: Harus tetap waspada. Kita tidak ingin tertangkap sedang tidur siang seperti yang dilakukan para Vigilants.

String.Source: Fine, then.
String.Dest: Baiklah, kalau begitu.

String.Source: Can't you tell your own kind? I smelled you almost before my eyes were open.
String.Dest: Tak bisakah kau memberitahu kaummu? Aku mencium baumu hampir sebelum mataku terbuka.

String.Source: I'll wait for you at the dock.
String.Dest: Aku akan menunggumu di dermaga.

String.Source: Is he working for my father?
String.Dest: Apakah dia bekerja untuk ayahku?

String.Source: May Auri-El's warmth imbue your body with strength.
String.Dest: Semoga kehangatan Auri-El mengisi tubuhmu dengan kekuatan.

String.Source: Jeron was furious to be left guarding the door.
String.Dest: Jeron sangat marah karena harus ditinggalkan untuk menjaga pintu.

String.Source: The feast never ends here in Castle Volkihar.
String.Dest: Pesta tidak pernah berakhir di sini di Castle Volkihar.

String.Source: With experience, your powers will grow and you will discover new ways to use them.
String.Dest: Dengan pengalaman, Powers Anda akan tumbuh dan Anda akan menemukan cara baru untuk menggunakannya.

String.Source: Too slow!
String.Dest: Terlalu Slow!

String.Source: Are you taking me to him?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu membawaku kepada dia?

String.Source: This is what your obsession brings you!
String.Dest: Inilah yang dibawa oleh obsesimu!

String.Source: Only thing that stood out for me was Auriel's Bow. That's a powerful weapon, and I sure as Oblivion don't want the vampires to get hold of it.
String.Dest: Satu-satunya hal yang menonjol bagiku adalah Busur Auriel. Itu senjata yang kuat, dan saya yakin seperti Oblivion tidak ingin para vampir memilikinya.

String.Source: I was expecting someone from my family. I don't recognize you. Are you one of my father's little acolytes?
String.Dest: Saya sedang menunggu seseorang dari keluarga saya. Saya tidak mengenalmu. Apakah kamu salah satu acolyte kecil ayahku?

String.Source: I'll be at the dock whenever you're ready.
String.Dest: Aku akan berada di dermaga kapan pun kau siap.

String.Source: Nothing else?
String.Dest: Tidak ada lagi?

String.Source: Stay back!
String.Dest: Jauhkan diri!

String.Source: Sit down and enjoy yourself.
String.Dest: Duduklah dan nikmati dirimu.

String.Source: I wish I could say that I did, but without the other two Scrolls, the picture will remain incomplete.
String.Dest: Saya berharap saya bisa mengatakan bahwa saya melakukannya, tetapi tanpa dua Gulungan lainnya, gambar itu akan tetap tidak lengkap.

String.Source: I was going to say the same thing to you.
String.Dest: Aku akan mengucapkan hal yang sama kepadamu.

String.Source: I... I suppose this is difficult for you.
String.Dest: Aku... Aku rasa ini sulit bagimu.

String.Source: I'll never tell you anything, vampire. My oath to Stendarr is stronger than any suffering you can inflict on me.
String.Dest: Saya tidak akan pernah memberitahumu apa pun, vampir. Sumpahku kepada Stendarr lebih kuat daripada penderitaan apa pun yang dapat kau timbulkan padaku.

String.Source: Well, well. You made it. Good. Isran's in the fort. He'll get you sorted out.
String.Dest: Ya, ya. Kau berhasil sampai sini. Bagus. Isran ada di benteng. Dia akan mengatur semuanya untukmu.

String.Source: Home? Where's that?
String.Dest: Rumah? Di mana itu?

String.Source: Good. Go and speak to Garan Marethi. Tell him it is time. He will understand.
String.Dest: Bagus. Pergi dan berbicara dengan Garan Marethi. Katakan padanya bahwa waktunya sudah tiba. Dia akan mengerti.

String.Source: I need to speak to you, stranger. Now.
String.Dest: Saya perlu berbicara denganmu, orang asing. Sekarang.

String.Source: This day was always coming!
String.Dest: Hari ini selalu akan datang!

String.Source: I never forget who my friends are. Or my enemies.
String.Dest: Aku tidak pernah melupakan siapa teman-temanku. Atau musuh-musuhku.

String.Source: Right. So they have this woman, and an Elder Scroll.
String.Dest: Benar. Jadi mereka memiliki wanita ini, dan sebuah Gulungan Elder.

String.Source: I did what needed to be done. Nothing more.
String.Dest: Saya melakukan apa yang perlu dilakukan. Tidak lebih.

String.Source: My lady, you have my deepest sympathies. I am sure this was not easy for you.
String.Dest: Nona, Anda memiliki simpati terdalam saya. Saya yakin ini tidak mudah bagi Anda.

String.Source: Tolan was telling me about some cave that the Vigilants were poking around in. Seemed to think it was related to these recent vampire attacks.
String.Dest: Tolan memberitahuku tentang sebuah gua yang sedang dijelajahi oleh para Vigilants. Dia tampaknya berpikir itu terkait dengan serangan vampir baru-baru ini.

String.Source: And so you delivered her to them.
String.Dest: Jadi kau menyerahkannya kepada mereka.

String.Source: For centuries we lived here, far from the cares of the world. All that ended when my wife betrayed me and stole away that which I valued most.
String.Dest: Selama berabad-abad kami tinggal di sini, jauh dari kepedulian dunia. Semua itu berakhir ketika istri saya mengkhianati saya dan mencuri apa yang paling saya hargai.

String.Source: Come on. It's just around the side.
String.Dest: Ayo. Itu cuma di samping.

String.Source: I'm not going to do that for you.
String.Dest: Aku tidak akan melakukan itu untukmu.

String.Source: Then people stopped taking the threat seriously, the Dawnguard was disbanded, and the vampires came creeping back.
String.Dest: Kemudian orang-orang berhenti menganggap ancaman itu serius, Dawnguard dibubarkan, dan para vampir kembali merayap.

String.Source: You have done me a great service, and now you must be rewarded.
String.Dest: Anda telah memberikan jasa besar kepada saya, dan kini Anda harus diberi penghargaan.

String.Source: I'm over here!
String.Dest: Aku di sini!

String.Source: Your powers are nothing!
String.Dest: Makhluk Powersmu tidak ada artinya!

String.Source: How many of you are there?!
String.Dest: Berapa banyak di antara kalian?!

String.Source: In the old days, the Dawnguard kept all of Skyrim safe from those bloodsucking scum.
String.Dest: Pada zaman dulu, Dawnguard menjaga seluruh Skyrim tetap aman dari para brengsek pemakan darah itu.

String.Source: Very well. I am Harkon, lord of this court. By now, my daughter will have told you what we are.
String.Dest: Baiklah. Saya Harkon, tuan dari pengadilan ini. Saat ini, putri saya pasti sudah memberitahumu siapa kami.

String.Source: If you want me to come along, it has to just be me and you.
String.Dest: Jika kau ingin aku ikut, itu harus hanya aku dan kau.

String.Source: I don't trust that man, and I don't want him here.
String.Dest: Saya tidak mempercayai pria itu, dan saya tidak menginginkannya di sini.

String.Source: I was expecting someone... like me, at least.
