String.Dest: Saya mengharapkan seseorang... seperti saya, setidaknya.

String.Source: Find your own thrall. This one's mine.
String.Dest: Cari budakmu sendiri. Yang ini milikku.

String.Source: Finished?
String.Dest: Selesai?

String.Source: Well? I'm waiting.
String.Dest: Ya? Aku menunggu.

String.Source: Damn fool. I told him not to go. The Vigilants always had more bravery than sense.
String.Dest: Sialan bodoh. Aku sudah bilang padanya jangan pergi. Para Vigilant selalu memiliki lebih banyak keberanian daripada akal.

String.Source: You can't hide, father!
String.Dest: Kamu tidak bisa bersembunyi, ayah!

String.Source: I'm gonna have to kill you... again!
String.Dest: Aku harus membunuhmu... lagi!

String.Source: He's such a loyal beast. Here, I'll teach you how to call him to you.
String.Dest: Dia sungguh binatang yang setia. Nah, aku akan mengajarmu cara memanggilnya kepadamu.

String.Source: No, we are vampires, among the oldest and most powerful in Skyrim.
String.Dest: Tidak, kami adalah vampir, di antara yang tertua dan paling kuat di Skyrim.

String.Source: He knew nothing. He served his purpose by leading us to this place. Now it is up to us to bring Harkon the prize.
String.Dest: Dia tidak tahu apa-apa. Dia menjalankan tugasnya dengan menuntun kami ke tempat ini. Sekarang terserah kami untuk membawa Harkon hadiah itu.

String.Source: Ha. Nothing can destroy an Elder Scroll. Worry more about protecting your hide, and let me worry about my things.
String.Dest: Ha. Tidak ada yang dapat menghancurkan Gulungan Elder. Lebih khawatir melindungi kulitmu, dan biarkan aku khawatir tentang urusanku.

String.Source: Suit yourself.
String.Dest: Sesukakan saja.

String.Source: So let me take the lead in there.
String.Dest: Jadi izinkan aku yang memimpin di sana.

String.Source: Were you looking for me?
String.Dest: Apakah kau mencari aku?

String.Source: Peace at last...
String.Dest: Akhirnya damai...

String.Source: Get rid of this interloper and you and I can be on our way.
String.Dest: Singkirkan penyusup ini, dan kau serta aku dapat melanjutkan perjalanan.

String.Source: I thought Lokil knew what he was doing. This is taking too long.
String.Dest: Saya pikir Lokil tahu apa yang dia lakukan. Ini terlalu lama.

String.Source: Let me know if you want me along.
String.Dest: Beritahu aku jika kau ingin aku ikut.

String.Source: Teamwork, right there.
String.Dest: Kerjasama, tepat di sana.

String.Source: I'm a loyal servant of the lord of the castle, nothing more.
String.Dest: Saya adalah pelayan setia sang tuan kastil, tidak lebih.

String.Source: I'm on it.
String.Dest: Saya sedang mengerjakannya.

String.Source: May Auri-El's brilliance illuminate your path.
String.Dest: Semoga cahaya Auriâ€‘El menerangi jalanmu.

String.Source: The Moth Priest can stay here for now. As for the vampire, I still don't trust it, so keep it on a leash.
String.Dest: Pendeta Ngengat dapat tinggal di sini untuk saat ini. Untuk vampir, saya masih tidak mempercayainya, jadi ikatlah dia dengan tali.

String.Source: The two of them just never got along. That's why Isran didn't have you go looking for him when he sent you after us.
String.Dest: Mereka berdua memang tidak pernah akur. Itulah mengapa Isran tidak menyuruhmu mencarinya ketika dia mengirimmu mengejar kami.

String.Source: Did you see where it went?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu melihat ke mana itu pergi?

String.Source: I still remember how to fight!
String.Dest: Aku masih ingat cara bertarung!

String.Source: I've waited a long time for my chance to move up in the court.
String.Dest: Saya telah menunggu lama untuk kesempatan naik pangkat di istana.

String.Source: That would fit with the rest of it... I don't like it, but you did right to play along. We need to find out what this is all about.
String.Dest: Itu akan cocok dengan yang lain... Aku tidak menyukainya, tapi kau memang benar ikut serta. Kita harus mencari tahu apa semua ini.

String.Source: I can't do everything for you.
String.Dest: Aku tidak bisa melakukan semuanya untukmu.

String.Source: Not quite, though I can see how an outsider might arrive at that conclusion.
String.Dest: Tidak tepat, namun saya bisa mengerti bagaimana orang luar mungkin sampai pada kesimpulan itu.

String.Source: Trust me. I lived in that castle for a very long time and I know every nook and cranny.
String.Dest: Percayalah. Aku telah tinggal di kastil itu sangat lama dan aku tahu setiap sudut dan celahnya.

String.Source: I'm not known for my patience.
String.Dest: Aku tidak dikenal karena kesabaranku.

String.Source: Don't think that'll keep them from turning on you eventually. They'll figure out what you are.
String.Dest: Jangan berpikir itu akan menghentikan mereka berbalik melawamu pada akhirnya. Mereka akan mengetahui siapa kamu sebenarnya.

String.Source: There is much to learn, but if you master the powers of the Vampire Lord, few enemies will be able to stand against you.
String.Dest: Masih banyak yang harus dipelajari, namun jika kamu menguasai Powers dari Vampire Lord, hanya sedikit musuh yang dapat melawanimu.

String.Source: Someone is here. Find them!
String.Dest: Seseorang ada di sini. Temukan dia!

String.Source: And we will not return without it. Vingalmo and Orthjolf will make way for me after this.
String.Dest: Dan kami tidak akan kembali tanpa itu. Vingalmo dan Orthjolf akan memberi jalan bagi saya setelah ini.

String.Source: Look, this whole blood ritual is a bit personal. I'd rather not have a bigger audience than I need to.
String.Dest: Lihat, seluruh ritual darah ini agak pribadi. Aku lebih baik tidak memiliki penonton yang lebih besar daripada yang aku butuhkan.

String.Source: Well, I don't take just anyone into the secret parts of the place I grew up.
String.Dest: Yah, aku tidak menerima sembarangan orang ke bagian rahasia tempat aku dibesarkan.

String.Source: Suit yourself.
String.Dest: Sesukakan saja.

String.Source: Of course! Let's go.
String.Dest: Tentu saja! Ayo pergi.

String.Source: Why would someone who isn't... like me... come all the way down here?
String.Dest: Kenapa orang yang bukan... seperti aku... harus turun sejauh ini?

String.Source: Here, take this one and give it a try. You'll want to get to know how to use it if you really plan to join the Dawnguard.
String.Dest: Berikut, ambil satu ini dan cobalah. Kamu ingin mempelajari cara menggunakannya jika benarâ€‘benar berencana bergabung dengan Dawnguard.

String.Source: I believe you, Vigilant. And I don't think you even know what you've found here.
String.Dest: Saya percaya padamu, Vigilant. Dan saya tidak berpikir kau bahkan tahu apa yang kau temukan di sini.

String.Source: I leave politics to others. I serve the lord of the castle.
String.Dest: Saya menyerahkan politik kepada orang lain. Saya melayani tuan kastil.

String.Source: Of course, my dear. All will be well now.
String.Dest: Tentu saja, sayangku. Segalanya akan baik-baik saja sekarang.

String.Source: Well, look. Kill me, you've killed one vampire. But if people are after me, there's something bigger going on.
String.Dest: Baiklah, lihat. Bunuh aku, kau sudah membunuh satu vampir. Tetapi jika orang-orang mengejarku, ada sesuatu yang lebih besar sedang terjadi.

String.Source: If you want me to come along, it has to just be me and you.
String.Dest: Jika kau ingin aku ikut, itu harus hanya aku dan kau.

String.Source: Now it's a race to claim the remaining Scrolls and discover what part Auriel's Bow has to play in this prophecy.
String.Dest: Sekarang ini menjadi perlombaan untuk merebut Gulungan-gulungan yang tersisa dan menemukan peran apa yang dimainkan Busur Auriel dalam ramalan ini.

String.Source: It's... complicated. I can't really talk about it. I'm sorry.
String.Dest: Ini... rumit. Aku tidak bisa benar-benar membicarakannya. Maaf.

String.Source: Look out! Gargoyles!
String.Dest: Awas! Gargoyle!

String.Source: Here we go, let's get the blood flowing again.
String.Dest: Ayo, mari kita mengalirkan darah lagi.

String.Source: What have you got?
String.Dest: Apa yang kau punya?

String.Source: Let's just say a tiny part of you rubbed off on it, and in its place, a bit of the Soul Cairn filled the void.
String.Dest: Katakan saja sebagian kecil darimu menempel padanya, dan menggantikannya, sedikit Soul Cairn mengisi kekosongan itu.

String.Source: Unh... who are you?
String.Dest: Unh... siapa kamu?

String.Source: I'm waiting to hear what any of this means.
String.Dest: Aku menunggu untuk mendengar apa arti semua ini.

String.Source: I heard a lot of vague nonsense. You could interpret that a hundred different ways.
String.Dest: Saya mendengar banyak omong kosong yang samar. Anda dapat menafsirkannya dengan seratus cara yang berbeda.

String.Source: With each passing day that you do not feed, that weakness will become more deadly, but your powers will also become stronger.
String.Dest: Dengan setiap hari yang berlalu tanpa Anda memberi makan, kelemahan itu akan menjadi lebih mematikan, tetapi Powers Anda juga akan menjadi lebih kuat.

String.Source: Changed your mind, huh? The Dawnguard could use somebody like you.
String.Dest: Berubah pikiran, ya? The Dawnguard bisa menggunakan orang seperti kamu.

String.Source: He's a very powerful man. Or he was at one point. I'm surprised another vampire hasn't heard of him.
String.Dest: Dia adalah seorang pria yang sangat kuat. Atau dulu dia memang begitu. Saya terkejut vampir lain belum pernah mendengarnya.

String.Source: Are you one of my father's little acolytes?
String.Dest: Apakah kau salah satu akolita kecil ayahku?

String.Source: You're not going to keep me in here!
String.Dest: Kau tidak akan menahuku di sini!

String.Source: I was about to suggest that very thing. Yes, you most certainly deserve a reward.
String.Dest: Aku hampir mengusulkan hal itu. Ya, kau memang sangat pantas mendapatkan hadiah.

String.Source: No, just...
String.Dest: Tidak, hanya...

String.Source: I can help you find out what that is.
String.Dest: Saya bisa membantu Anda mencari tahu apa itu.

String.Source: Last I'd heard of him, he was aiding the Vigilants of Stendarr at Ruunvald. He may still be there.
String.Dest: Terakhir kali saya mendengarnya, dia sedang membantu Vigilants of Stendarr di Ruunvald. Dia mungkin masih di sana.

String.Source: Sorry it had to be this way!
String.Dest: Maaf, memang harus seperti ini!

String.Source: Here, you should take a crossbow. Good for taking out those fiends before they get close.
String.Dest: Ini, kamu sebaiknya mengambil crossbow. Berguna untuk menyingkirkan makhluk-makhluk itu sebelum mereka mendekat.

String.Source: A... can't you tell just from looking at me? A vampire.
String.Dest: A... bukankah kamu bisa mengetahuinya hanya dari melihatku? Seorang vampir.

String.Source: As a vampire, you will gain new powers, but also a weakness to sunlight.
String.Dest: Sebagai vampir, Anda akan memperoleh Powers baru, tetapi juga kelemahan terhadap sinar matahari.

String.Source: I think perhaps... I think you did more than that. You have my thanks.
String.Dest: Saya rasa... Saya rasa Anda telah melakukan lebih dari itu. Anda memiliki terima kasih saya.

String.Source: I'm ready if you are.
String.Dest: Saya siap jika Anda siap.

String.Source: Did you see where he went?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu melihat ke mana dia pergi?

String.Source: I admit, I feel a bit frustrated that I can't be more helpful. Still, our enemy is likely just as much in the dark as we are, and that's something.
String.Dest: Aku mengakui, aku merasa agak frustasi karena tidak bisa membantu lebih banyak. Namun, musuh kita kemungkinan berada dalam kegelapan sebanyak kita, dan itu sesuatu.

String.Source: You go ahead. I'll talk to Isran in a minute.
String.Dest: Kamu dulu. Aku akan berbicara dengan Isran dalam satu menit.

String.Source: By the Divines, this couldn't get much worse. This is more than you and I can handle.
String.Dest: Demi Para Dewa, ini tidak bisa menjadi lebih buruk lagi. Ini lebih dari yang bisa kau dan aku tangani.

String.Source: What is it?
String.Dest: Apa itu?

String.Source: Did you see where she went?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu melihat ke mana dia pergi?

String.Source: But if you want to know the whole story, help me get back to my family's home.
String.Dest: Tapi jika kamu ingin mengetahui seluruh ceritanya, bantu aku kembali ke rumah keluargaku.

String.Source: Isran found something for you to do, eh? I thought he'd like you. Good luck!
String.Dest: Isran menemukan sesuatu untuk kamu lakukan, ya? Kupikir dia suka kamu. Semoga berhasil!

String.Source: Unnnhhhh...
String.Dest: Uhnnnhhhh...

String.Source: I did, in fact. Quite perceptive of you.
String.Dest: Aku memang melakukannya. Sangat tajam pengamatanmu.

String.Source: Now be silent, and hear what I have to say.
String.Dest: Sekarang diamlah, dan dengarkan apa yang ingin kuucapkan.

String.Source: All right. I'll meet you back at the castle.
String.Dest: Baiklah. Aku akan menemuimu kembali di istana.

String.Source: My apologies. I shall not trouble you with it again.
String.Dest: Maafkan saya. Saya tidak akan mengganggu Anda dengan hal itu lagi.

String.Source: I'm not happy about this. He... he was still my father. But I suppose my father really died a long time ago.
String.Dest: Aku tidak senang dengan ini. Dia... dia dulu masih ayahku. Tapi kurasa ayahku memang sudah meninggal lama sekali.

String.Source: Then I think I shall see to the repairs. Thank you for your time.
String.Dest: Kalau begitu, saya rasa saya akan mengurus perbaikan itu. Terima kasih atas waktu Anda.

String.Source: Don't you already have someone at home waiting for you?
String.Dest: Bukankah kamu sudah memiliki seseorang di rumah yang menunggu kamu?

String.Source: I'll stick around this place if you need me.
String.Dest: Aku akan tetap berada di tempat ini kalau kau membutuhkanku.

String.Source: This has certainly been quite the adventure, hasn't it?
String.Dest: Petualangan ini memang cukup seru, bukan?

String.Source: You'll get the hang of it.
String.Dest: Kamu akan terbiasa dengan itu.

String.Source: I admit, I do not entirely understand your sense of humor.
String.Dest: Saya mengakui, saya tidak sepenuhnya mengerti selera humor Anda.

String.Source: You're infected? Get away from me. Get yourself cured, or don't come near Fort Dawnguard again.
String.Dest: Kamu terinfeksi? Jauhkan dirimu dariku. Sembuhkan dirimu, atau jangan lagi mendekati Fort Dawnguard.

String.Source: I'll be at Castle Volkihar if you need me.
String.Dest: Saya akan berada di Castle Volkihar jika Anda membutuhkan saya.

String.Source: It's around the side of the castle. Let's move.
String.Dest: Itu di sekitar sisi kastil. Ayo bergerak.

String.Source: I'll not aid a vampire. Not even you. Get yourself cured, or you're dead to me.
String.Dest: Aku tidak akan membantu vampir. Bahkan tidak untukmu. Sembuhkan dirimu, atau kau mati bagiku.

String.Source: Hm. Most interesting.
String.Dest: Hm. Sangat menarik.

String.Source: Get it on the ground!
String.Dest: Taruh di tanah!

String.Source: From what I saw in the vision, the Elder Scroll which foreshadows the defiance of the gods with the blood of mortals is the key to the prophecy.
String.Dest: Dari apa yang kulihat dalam penglihatan, Gulungan Elder yang meramalkan pemberontakan para dewa dengan darah para mortal adalah kunci ramalan itu.

String.Source: Lord Harkon will finally have his wish... to see the prophecy fulfilled. Then we will all benefit.
String.Dest: Lord Harkon akan akhirnya mendapatkan keinginannya... untuk menyaksikan ramalan terpenuhi. Maka kita semua akan mendapat manfaat.

String.Source: You'd better know what you're doing.
String.Dest: Sebaiknya kamu tahu apa yang kamu lakukan.

String.Source: Is it really you? I can't believe it!
String.Dest: Benarkah itu kamu? Aku tidak percaya!

String.Source: Ah, yes. Hmm. I'm afraid they don't quite work that way.
String.Dest: Ah, ya. Hmm. Saya khawatir mereka tidak berfungsi seperti itu.

String.Source: They are determined and well-armed, but foolish if they think they can defy us. We will deal with them in time.
String.Dest: Mereka gigih dan bersenjata lengkap, namun bodoh jika mereka berpikir dapat menentang kami. Kami akan menanganinya pada waktunya.

String.Source: All right. I'll meet you at the glade.
String.Dest: Baiklah. Aku akan menemuimu di sebuah lapangan terbuka.

String.Source: By the way... my name is Serana. Good to meet you.
String.Dest: Omong-omong... nama saya Serana. Senang bertemu denganmu.

String.Source: You've managed to turn into one of them. Wonderful. I won't kill you, but you'd better get yourself cured.
String.Dest: Kau berhasil berubah menjadi salah satu dari mereka. Luar biasa. Aku tidak akan membunuhmu, tapi sebaiknya kau menyembuhkan dirimu sendiri.

String.Source: Now that the Castle is yours, I was wondering.
String.Dest: Sekarang kastil itu menjadi milikmu, saya bertanya-tanya.

String.Source: I'm not going to blamed for whatever happens.
String.Dest: Aku tidak akan disalahkan atas apa pun yang terjadi.

String.Source: Who knows, maybe it has a death wish. Maybe it's just insane. I don't really care.
String.Dest: Siapa yang tahu, mungkin dia ingin mati. Mungkin dia hanya gila. Aku tidak terlalu peduli.

String.Source: Can we really trust the words of this Moth Priest? What if he's just lying to save his worthless skin?
String.Dest: Bisakah kita benarâ€‘benarnya mempercayai kataâ€‘kata Pendeta Kupuâ€‘Kupu ini? Bagaimana kalau dia hanya berbohong untuk menyelamatkan kulitnya yang tak berharga?

String.Source: Might I offer an alternative?
String.Dest: Bolehkah saya menawarkan alternatif?

String.Source: I think we've talked about that enough. Come on, now.
String.Dest: Saya rasa kita sudah cukup membicarakannya. Ayo, sekarang.

String.Source: I wish I could have been there to hear the sounds of their screams.
String.Dest: Saya berharap saya bisa berada di sana untuk mendengar suara jeritan mereka.

String.Source: We need to do something about these vampire attacks.
String.Dest: Kita harus melakukan sesuatu mengenai serangan vampir ini.

String.Source: Where're these vampires coming from? We need to wipe them out before things get worse.
String.Dest: Dari mana vampirâ€‘vampir ini datang? Kita harus menghabiskan mereka sebelum keadaan menjadi lebih buruk.

String.Source: Oh, no. No way. I'm not helping a vampire. Get out of here, get yourself cured.
String.Dest: Ah, tidak. Tidak mungkin. Aku tidak akan membantu vampir. Pergi dari sini, sembuhkan dirimu.

String.Source: Good. Strong instincts and a cunning mind will serve you as well as blade, spell or claw.
String.Dest: Bagus. Naluri yang kuat dan pikiran yang licik akan melayani Anda sama baiknya dengan pedang, mantra, atau cakar.

String.Source: A Moth Priest?
String.Dest: Seorang Pendeta Kupu-kupu?

String.Source: Kill the beast!
String.Dest: Bunuh binatang itu!

String.Source: I'd very much like to have those scrolls. Someday I may be able to return them to their rightful place in the Imperial City.
String.Dest: Saya sangat ingin memiliki gulungan-gulungan itu. Suatu hari saya mungkin dapat mengembalikannya ke tempat yang semestinya di Kota Imperial.

String.Source: Yes, certainly. Are you willing to let me have them?
String.Dest: Ya, tentu saja. Apakah kamu bersedia membiarkanku memilikinya?

String.Source: Can you imagine it? A world without a sun... we would all have been doomed, vampires and men alike.
String.Dest: Bisakah kau membayangkannya? Dunia tanpa matahari... kami semua akan binasa, baik vampir maupun manusia.

String.Source: That's it.
String.Dest: Itu saja.

String.Source: I thought you said you were happy together.
String.Dest: Aku pikir kau bilang kau bahagia bersama.

String.Source: Harkon's short-sightedness was his undoing. In his lust for power, he failed to consider the full consequences of his plans.
String.Dest: Keterbatasan pandangan Harkon menjadi kejatuhannya. Dalam nafsu kekuasaannya, dia gagal mempertimbangkan konsekuensi penuh dari rencananya.

String.Source: Mind yourself.
String.Dest: Jaga dirimu.

String.Source: Of course they did. I never doubted for a moment.
String.Dest: Tentu saja mereka melakukannya. Aku tidak pernah meragukannya sesaat pun.

String.Source: Mind yourself. There's a vicious bear on the loose.
String.Dest: Perhatikan dirimu. Ada beruang buas berkeliaran.

String.Source: I knew it was a matter of time before the vampires would come for us.
String.Dest: Saya tahu itu hanya masalah waktu sebelum vampir datang untuk kami.

String.Source: Just one gyro. One, and I can get back to work. Where are they?
String.Dest: Hanya satu gyro. Satu saja, dan aku bisa kembali bekerja. Di mana mereka?

String.Source: But... that's just not something I'm going to be able to do. Ever.
String.Dest: Tapi... itu bukan sesuatu yang akan pernah bisa ku lakukan. Selamanya.

String.Source: These vampires are becoming a real menace.
String.Dest: Para vampir ini sedang menjadi ancaman yang nyata.

String.Source: No matter. Serana will sacrifice her blood for the sake of the prophecy, and I will feast upon yours in Molag Bal's honor!
String.Dest: Tidak masalah. Serana akan mengorbankan darahnya demi ramalan, dan aku akan bersantap dengan milikmu demi kehormatan Molag Bal!

String.Source: Oh. All right then. You know where to find me.
String.Dest: Oh. Baiklah. Kamu tahu di mana menemukanku.

String.Source: You're sweet. And... I'm not stupid. I can see what you're getting at.
String.Dest: Kau manis. Dan... aku tidak bodoh. Aku mengerti apa yang kau maksud.

String.Source: All right. I'll meet you at Darkfall Cave.
String.Dest: Baiklah. Aku akan menemuimu di Darkfall Cave.

String.Source: I'll be around here if you need me.
String.Dest: Aku akan berada di sekitar sini jika kau membutuhkanku.

String.Source: Get it now while we can!
String.Dest: Ambil sekarang selagi kita bisa!

String.Source: I'll bring you down!
String.Dest: Aku akan menjatuhkanmu!

String.Source: They say if a vampire so much as scratches you, you'll turn into one. That better not be true.
String.Dest: Mereka bilang kalau vampir sekadar menggarukmu, kamu akan menjadi vampir juga. Semoga itu tidak benar.

String.Source: What would you have of me, master?
String.Dest: Apa yang Anda inginkan dariku, Tuan?

String.Source: No? Well, I've given it a bit of thought.
String.Dest: Tidak? Yah, aku sudah memikirkannya sedikit.

String.Source: It will be done, my lord!
String.Dest: Akan dilaksanakan, Tuanku!

String.Source: Oh, I get it. Is that why you're wearing an Amulet of Mara?
String.Dest: Oh, aku mengerti. Apakah itu sebabnya kamu memakai Amulet of Mara?

String.Source: Seems you're the court favorite. At least, for the moment.
String.Dest: Nampaknya kamu adalah favorit istana. Setidaknya, untuk saat ini.

String.Source: It's just... it's not for me.
String.Dest: Hanya... ini bukan untukku.

String.Source: But... with everything in my past, I don't think I could bring myself to go into a temple and ask for that kind of blessing.
String.Dest: Tapi... dengan semua yang terjadi di masa laluku, aku rasa aku tidak bisa memaksa diriku untuk masuk ke sebuah kuil dan meminta berkat semacam itu.

String.Source: Ah, yes. I see. Well, if you do change your mind, please let me know.
String.Dest: Ah, ya. Aku mengerti. Kalau kamu berubah pikiran, beri tahu aku.

String.Source: Oh my, that's... Well, that's not exactly what I had in mind.
String.Dest: Ya ampun, itu... Yah, itu bukan persis apa yang saya pikirkan.

String.Source: Especially not me. I mean... with my history, I still kind of get a chill just walking by a temple. Can't imagine going in one.
String.Dest: Terutama bukan aku. Maksudku... dengan sejarahku, aku masih agak merinding hanya dengan berjalan melewati sebuah kuil. Tak bisa membayangkan masuk ke dalamnya.

String.Source: Look, you're great. Really. But I just don't think that's for us.
String.Dest: Dengar, kamu hebat. Sungguh. Tapi aku rasa itu bukan untuk kami.

String.Source: Gods, you're one of them! Get yourself cured before you think about asking me to help you again.
String.Dest: Dewa, kau salah satu dari mereka! Sembuhkan dirimu dulu sebelum kau berpikir meminta bantuanku lagi.

String.Source: Pitiful. Simply pitiful. I expected more from the defiant fool that beguiled my daughter.
String.Dest: Menyedihkan. Sungguh menyedihkan. Saya mengharapkan lebih dari orang bodoh yang memberontak itu, yang menipu putri saya.

String.Source: Well, now that's done.
String.Dest: Nah, sekarang sudah selesai.

String.Source: All right. If you say so.
String.Dest: Baiklah. Kalau begitu.

String.Source: Dragons breathing fire in the sky. Vampires brazenly attacking people on the street. It's the end of the world I tell you.
String.Dest: Dragons menyemburkan api di langit. Para vampir dengan berani menyerang orang-orang di jalan. Ini adalah kiamat, aku katakan.

String.Source: If I may ask, what will you do with them now?
String.Dest: Jika saya boleh bertanya, apa yang akan Anda lakukan dengan mereka sekarang?

String.Source: Take a deep breath and let it out as you fire.
String.Dest: Tarik napas dalam-dalam dan hembuskan saat kamu menembak.

String.Source: Let's just pretend you didn't, all right?
String.Dest: Ayo pura-pura saja kamu tidak melakukannya, ya?

String.Source: You're sweet to say that, but you need to sort things out on your own. It's not something I'm going to get involved with.
String.Dest: Kamu manis mengatakannya, tapi kamu harus menyelesaikannya sendiri. Itu bukan sesuatu yang akan saya terlibat.

String.Source: If you're not happy with things... that's not my business.
String.Dest: Jika kamu tidak puas dengan segala hal... itu bukan urusanku.

String.Source: I'm not going to be the one to destroy a marriage. I'm sorry.
String.Dest: Aku tidak akan menjadi orang yang menghancurkan Marriage. Maaf.

String.Source: Set my hatred aside? Not a chance. It's what keeps me strong.
String.Dest: Menyisihkan kebencianku? Tidak mungkin. Itulah yang membuatku kuat.

String.Source: I think my father really died a long time ago. This was just... the end of something else.
String.Dest: Saya rasa ayah saya benarâ€‘benar sudah meninggal sejak lama. Ini hanyalah... akhir dari sesuatu yang lain.

String.Source: Bother someone else.
String.Dest: Mengganggu orang lain.

String.Source: This was just the end of something else.
String.Dest: Ini hanyalah akhir dari sesuatu yang lain.

String.Source: Do not presume to tell me who I can and cannot trust. I possess the wisdom of a dozen lifetimes, and I will make my own judgements.
String.Dest: Jangan berani mengatakanku siapa yang boleh atau tidak boleh kupercayai. Aku memiliki kebijaksanaan dari selusin hidup, dan aku akan membuat penilaianku sendiri.

String.Source: We both know that a band of fools with crossbows is no match for a scion of the ancient blood.
String.Dest: Kita berdua tahu bahwa sekelompok orang bodoh dengan busur silang tidak sebanding dengan keturunan darah kuno.

String.Source: Watch the recoil. Takes some getting used to.
String.Dest: Perhatikan recoil. Butuh waktu untuk terbiasa.

String.Source: Once again, the Elder Scrolls have proven their value.
String.Dest: Sekali lagi, Gulungan Elder telah membuktikan nilai mereka.

String.Source: I'm sure Lord Harkon is grateful you've returned his daughter.
String.Dest: Saya yakin Lord Harkon berterima kasih karena Anda telah mengembalikan putrinya.

String.Source: Would you be interested in having the passage to the Courtyard restored? Harkon clearly never cared much for it.
String.Dest: Apakah Anda tertarik untuk memperbaiki jalur ke Halaman? Harkon jelas tidak terlalu peduli padanya.

String.Source: All this talk of Elder Scrolls and Auriel's Bow... Lord Harkon's ambition truly is great.
String.Dest: Semua pembicaraan tentang Gulungan Elder dan Busur Auriel... Ambisi Lord Harkon sungguh besar.

String.Source: It would be my pleasure.
String.Dest: Itu akan menjadi kesenangan saya.

String.Source: Oh dear. No, I'm afraid that's not going to work at all.
String.Dest: Ya ampun. Tidak, saya khawatir itu tidak akan berhasil sama sekali.

String.Source: What would mudcrabs want with my satchel, anyway?
String.Dest: Mau apa kepiting lumpur dengan tas saya, sih?

String.Source: You need to concentrate, boy. Try it again.
String.Dest: Kamu harus berkonsentrasi, nak. Coba lagi.

String.Source: Thank you! You're too kind.
String.Dest: Terima kasih! Anda terlalu baik.

String.Source: Still, if it means their safe-keeping, I suppose it is worth it.
String.Dest: Namun, jika itu berarti mereka dijaga dengan aman, saya rasa itu sepadan.

String.Source: How would you feel about turning them over to me?
String.Dest: Bagaimana perasaanmu jika menyerahkan mereka kepadaku?

String.Source: Given how I've lived... what I've done... I can't ask the gods for a blessing like that.
String.Dest: Mengingat bagaimana aku telah hidup... apa yang telah kulakukan... Aku tidak bisa memohon kepada para dewa untuk mendapatkan berkat seperti itu.

String.Source: Look, I care about you. A lot. And I'll come with you wherever you want to go.
String.Dest: Dengar, aku peduli padamu. Sangat. Dan aku akan ikut bersamamu ke mana pun kau ingin pergi.

String.Source: I have an alternative for you, if you'd be interested.
String.Dest: Saya punya alternatif untukmu, jika kamu tertarik.

String.Source: First Serana, now you find a Moth Priest. I'm sure Lord Harkon is very pleased with you... for now.
String.Dest: First Serana, now you find a Moth Priest. I'm sure Lord Harkon is very pleased with you... for now.

String.Source: Do you ever feel lonely?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu pernah merasa kesepian?

String.Source: Now it is time to see if those efforts have borne fruit. Go forth, and search the land for rumors of a Moth Priest within our borders.
String.Dest: Now it is time to see if those efforts have borne fruit. Go forth, and search the land for rumors of a Moth Priest within our borders.

String.Source: Leave it to my mother... always smarter than I gave her credit for.
String.Dest: Leave it to my mother... always smarter than I gave her credit for.

String.Source: I don't think we've reached the top yet. I'd bet there's some kind of secret passage around here.
String.Dest: Saya rasa kita belum sampai di puncak. Aku yakin ada semacam jalan rahasia di sekitar sini.

String.Source: I will be happy to assist you with your Elder Scroll. Just tell me where I need to go.
String.Dest: Saya akan senang membantu Anda dengan Gulungan Elder Anda. Beri tahu saya saja ke mana saya harus pergi.

String.Source: You do? Alright then, enough mysteries.
String.Dest: Kau memang? Baiklah, cukup dengan misteri itu.

String.Source: It may have driven my family apart, but I'm still here, and I'm alive. I won't give this up.
String.Dest: Mungkin ini telah memisahkan keluargaku, tapi aku masih di sini, dan aku masih hidup. Aku tidak akan melepaskannya.

String.Source: Well, you saved me from those vampires. I suppose the least that I can do is hear you out.
String.Dest: Yah, kau menyelamatkanku dari para vampir itu. Aku rasa hal paling sedikit yang bisa kulakukan adalah mendengarkanmu.

String.Source: If my knowledge of history serves me, I recall that the Dawnguard was an ancient order of vampire hunters.
String.Dest: Jika pengetahuan sejarah saya berguna, saya ingat bahwa Dawnguard adalah sebuah ordo kuno pemburu vampir.

String.Source: They what?
String.Dest: Mereka apa?

String.Source: Let's just say a tiny part of you rubbed off on it, and in its place, a bit of the Soul Cairn filled the void.
String.Dest: Katakan saja sebagian kecil darimu menempel padanya, dan menggantikannya, sedikit Soul Cairn mengisi kekosongan itu.

String.Source: You should find no difficulty using the portal any longer.
String.Dest: Anda seharusnya tidak mengalami kesulitan lagi saat menggunakan portal itu.

String.Source: As you've been traveling in the Soul Cairn, your body has become attuned to it.
String.Dest: Seiring kamu menjelajah di Soul Cairn, tubuhmu menjadi selaras dengannya.

String.Source: Neh...Viir!
String.Dest: Neh...Viir!

String.Source: I think perhaps you should speak to Isran. You don't look... well.
String.Dest: Saya pikir mungkin Anda harus berbicara dengan Isran. Anda tidak terlihat... baik.

String.Source: Dur...
String.Dest: Dur...

String.Source: Neh!
String.Dest: Neh!

String.Source: Dur!
String.Dest: Dur!

String.Source: Neh...Viir!
String.Dest: Neh...Viir!

String.Source: Dur...
String.Dest: Dur...

String.Source: Now that you've retrieved the Elder Scroll, you should be on your way.
String.Dest: Sekarang karena kamu telah mengambil Gulungan Elder, kamu seharusnya melanjutkan perjalananmu.

String.Source: I will see you dead, monster.
String.Dest: I will see you dead, monster.

String.Source: And what do you plan to do with it? Do you even know what you're asking about, or are you just someone's errand girl?
String.Dest: Dan apa yang kau rencanakan melakukannya? Apakah kau bahkan tahu apa yang kau tanyakan, atau hanya gadis pengantar tugas orang lain?

String.Source: What about... wait. Are you? Were you the one the Greybeards were calling?
String.Dest: Bagaimana dengan... tunggu. Apakah kamu? Apakah kamu orang yang The Greybeards panggil?

String.Source: But what you seek does not come easily, and can destroy those without a strong will.
String.Dest: Namun apa yang kau cari tidak datang dengan mudah, dan dapat menghancurkan mereka yang tidak memiliki kehendak yang kuat.

String.Source: Haven't heard from him since.
String.Dest: Aku belum mendengar kabar darinya sejak itu.

String.Source: So don't get your hopes up. It's mostly lies, leavened with rumor and conjecture.
String.Dest: Jadi jangan terlalu berharap. Itu kebanyakan kebohongan, diperkaya dengan rumor dan spekulasi.

String.Source: Rii...
String.Dest: Rii...

String.Source: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
String.Dest: (Nafas berat - berlari)

String.Source: (Heavy breathing)
String.Dest: (Napas berat)

String.Source: I'll bring you everything we have on them, but it's not much.
String.Dest: Saya akan membawa semua yang kami miliki tentang mereka, tapi tidak banyak.

String.Source: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
String.Dest: (Nafas berat - berlari)

String.Source: It is true there are some here who have spent years studying the accumulated knowledge of the scrolls.
String.Dest: Memang ada beberapa orang di sini yang telah menghabiskan bertahun-tahun mempelajari pengetahuan yang terkumpul dalam gulungan.

String.Source: The Elder Scroll gives insight deeper than the deep ones, though. To bring about the opening.
String.Dest: The Elder Scroll gives insight deeper than the deep ones, though. To bring about the opening.

String.Source: Somewhere up north, in the ice fields.
String.Dest: Somewhere up north, in the ice fields.

String.Source: Do you?
String.Dest: Apakah kamu?

String.Source: Became obsessed with the Dwemer. Took off north saying he had found some old artifact. Haven't seen him since.
String.Dest: Menjadi terobsesi dengan Dwemer. Pergi ke utara sambil mengklaim bahwa dia menemukan sebuah artefak kuno. Saya belum melihatnya sejak itu.

String.Source: (Heavy breathing)
String.Dest: (Napas berat)

String.Source: (Heavy breathing)
String.Dest: (Napas berat)

String.Source: As you desire.
String.Dest: Seperti yang kau inginkan.

String.Source: Somewhere in the ice fields, if you want to try to find him.
String.Dest: Di suatu tempat di padang es, jika Anda ingin mencoba menemukannya.

String.Source: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
String.Dest: (Nafas berat - berlari)

String.Source: Nothing, until you choose to use it.
String.Dest: Tidak ada, sampai kamu memilih untuk menggunakannya.

String.Source: Said he found some old Dwemer artifact, but... well, that was years ago.
String.Dest: Katanya dia menemukan sebuah artefak Dwemer lama, tapi... yah, itu sudah bertahunâ€‘tahun lalu.

String.Source: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
String.Dest: (Nafas berat - berlari)

String.Source: The ice entombs the heart. The bane of Kagrenac and Dagoth Ur.
String.Dest: Es mengurung hati. Penyebab kejatuhan Kagrenac dan Dagoth Ur.

String.Source: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
String.Dest: (Nafas berat - berlari)

String.Source: It doesn't last long, though. The blood of your foes can sustain you. If you're willing to feed.
String.Dest: Namun, itu tidak bertahan lama. Darah musuhmu dapat memeliharamu. Jika kau bersedia memakan darah mereka.

String.Source: Vaaz...Zol!
String.Dest: Vaaz...Zol!

String.Source: Rii!
String.Dest: Rii!

String.Source: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
String.Dest: (Nafas berat - berlari)

String.Source: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
String.Dest: (Nafas berat - berlari)

String.Source: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
String.Dest: (Nafas berat - berlari)

String.Source: (Heavy breathing - sprinting)
String.Dest: (Nafas berat - berlari)

String.Source: Oh no. I hope not. But even I haven't seen him in years, and we were close.
String.Dest: Oh tidak. Aku harap tidak. Tapi bahkan aku belum melihatnya selama bertahunâ€‘tahun, dan kami dulu dekat.

String.Source: It's a werewolf! To arms! To arms!
String.Dest: Itu werewolf! Angkat senjata! Angkat senjata!

String.Source: Werewolf!
String.Dest: Manusia serigala!
